Quote: Nobody ever lives their life all the way up except bullfighters.

Author: Charles Dickens,  A Tale of Two Cities
Quote: And a beautiful world we live in, when it is possible, and when many other such things are possible, and not only possible, but done-- done, see you!-- under that sky there, every day.

Author: Michelle Paver
Quote: Evil exists in us all, Torak. Some fight it. Some feed it. That's how it's always been.

Author: CrimethInc.
Quote: I always secretly looked forward to nothing going as planned. That way, I wasn't limited by my imagination. That way, anything can, and always did, happen.

Author: Santosh Kalwar
Quote: Always be like a water. Float in the times of pain or dance like waves along the wind which touches its surface.

Author: Pablo
Quote: Always Remember to take your Vitamins: Take your Vitamin A for ACTION, Vitamin B for Belief, Vitamin C for Confidence ,Vitamin D for Discipline, Vitamin E for Enthusiasm!!

Author: Thomas S. Monson
Quote: Men take care not to make women weep, for God counts their tears.

Author: Brandon Mull,  Fablehaven
Quote: What'll you do if you can't find a way to cure him?"Seth asked.Dale paused. "I'll never know that day has come, because I'll never stop trying.

Author: Michael Jackson
Quote: Look beyond yourself..

Author: Charles Leadbeater,  We Think: The Power Of Mass Creativity
Quote: You are what you share.

Author: C. JoyBell C.
Quote: Some people live in cages with bars built from their own fears and doubts. Some people live in cages with bars built from other people's fears and doubts; their parents, their friends, their brothers and sisters, their families. Some people live in cages with bars built from the choices others made for them, the circumstances other people imposed upon them. And some people break free.

Author: Charles F. Glassman,  Brain Drain The Breakthrough That Will Change Your Life
Quote: Believing in negative thoughts is the single greatest obstruction to success.

Author: Elizabeth Taylor
Quote: I feel very adventurous. There are so many doors to be opened, and I'm not afraid to look behind them.

Author: Hlovate,  Contengan Jalanan
Quote: Hidup hanya ada erti pada yang bahagia.

Author: Emily Dickinson
Quote: Tell all the Truth but tell it slant--Success in Circuit liesToo bright for our infirm DelightThe Truth's superb surpriseAs Lightning to the Children easedWith explanation kindThe Truth must dazzle graduallyOr every man be blind--

Author: Mahatma Gandhi
Quote: True beauty lies in purity of the heart.

Author: Ramana Maharshi
Quote: Your own Self-Realization is the greatest service you can render the world.

Author: G.K. Chesterton
Quote: We have all forgotten what we really are. All that we call common sense and rationality and practicality and positivism only means that for certain dead levels of our life we forget that we have forgotten. All that we call spirit and art and ecstasy only means that for one awful instant we remember that we forget.

Author: Maurice Maeterlinck
Quote: When we lose one we love, our bitterest tears are called forth by the memory of hours when we loved not enough.

Author: Alan Turing,  Computing machinery and intelligence
Quote: We can only see a short distance ahead, but we can see plenty there that needs to be done.

Author: Sukarno,  Indonesia Menggugat: Pidato Pembelaan Bung Karno di Muka Hakim Kolonial
Quote: Bebek berjalan berbondong-bondong, akan tetapi burung elang terbang sendirian.

Author: Cecelia Ahern,  The Gift
Quote: Time cannot be packaged and ribboned and left under trees for christmas morning.Time can't be given.But it can be shared

Author: James Patterson,  Sundays at Tiffany's
Quote: Love means never having to be apart

Author: Brian L. Weiss,  Muchas Vidas, Muchos Maestros
Quote: Inner peace is impossible without patience. Wisdom requires patience. Spiritual growth implies the mastery of patience. Patience allows the unfolding of destiny to proceed at its won unhurried pace.

Author: Paulo Coelho,  Aleph
Quote: Only children believe they're capable of everything.

Author: Selena Gómez
Quote: If there never was a night or day and memories could fade away, then we'd be nothing left but the dreams we made

Author: Anonymous,  Holy Bible: King James Version
Quote: Therefore, since we are receiving a kingdom that cannot be shaken, let us be thankful, and so worship God acceptably with reverence and awe, for our God is a consuming fire.

Author: Matt D. Miller
Quote: If you always attach positive emotions to the things you want, and never attach negative emotions to the things you don't, then that which you desire most will invariably come your way.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free
Quote: Stop giving meaningless praise and start giving meaningful action.

Author: Abraham Lincoln
Quote: Let no feeling of discouragement preyupon you, and in the end you are sure to succeed.

Author: Sherman Alexie
Quote: Read. Read 1000 pages for every 1 page that you write.

Author: L.J. Smith,  The Captive Part II / The Power
Quote: There is nothing frightening in the dark if you just face it.

Author: R.A. Salvatore
Quote: Change is not always growth, but growth is often rooted in change.Drizzt Do'Urden

Author: Jennifer Hudson Taylor,  Highland Blessings
Quote: Sometimes God makes better choices for us than we could have ever made for ourselves.

Author: Jaycee Dugard,  A Stolen Life
Quote: I don't believe in hate. To me it wastes too much time. People who hate waste so much of their life hating that they miss out on all the other stuff out here.

Author: L.M. Montgomery,  Anne of the Island
Quote: In imagination she sailed over storied seas that wash the distant shining shores of "faëry lands forlorn,"where lost Atlantis and Elysium lie, with the evening star for pilot, to the land of Heart's Desire. And she was richer in those dreams than in realities; for things seen pass away, but the things that are unseen are eternal.

Author: Dee Lestari,  Partikel
Quote: Kalau lawan bicaramu mendengar dengan sepenuh hati, beban pikiranmu menjadi ringan. Kalau kamu tambah ruwet, meski yang mendengarkanmu tadi seolah serius mendengar, berarti dia tidak benar-benar hadir untukmu.

Author: Hamka,  Di Bawah Lindungan Ka'bah
Quote: Saya akan pikul rahsia itu jika engkau percayakan kepada saya dan saya akan masukkan ke dalam perbendaharaan hati saya dan kemudian saya kunci pintunya erat-erat. Kunci itu akan saya lemparkan jauh-jauh sehingga seorang pun tak dapat mengambilnya kedalam lagi.

Author: Steve Maraboli
Quote: Once you start recognizing the truth of your story, finish the story. It happened but you're still here, you're still capable, powerful, you're not your circumstance. It happened and you made it through. You're still fully equipped with every single tool you need to fulfill your purpose.

Author: Henry David Thoreau
Quote: Do not lose hold of your dreams or aspirations. For if you do, you may still exist but you have ceased to live.

Author: Kurt Vonnegut,  Bagombo Snuff Box
Quote: Write to please just one person. If you open a window and make love to the world, so to speak, your story will get pneumonia.

Author: Louisa May Alcott,  Behind a Mask: The Unknown Thrillers of Louisa May Alcott
Quote: Nothing is impossible to a determined woman.

Author: Garrison Keillor,  Lake Wobegon U.S.A.
Quote: Some luck lies in not getting what you thought you wanted but getting what you have, which once you have it you may be smart enough to see is what you would have wanted had you known.

Author: Justin Bieber
Quote: My friends say I'm a fool to think that you're the one for me, I guess I'm just a sucker for love. (love love) 'Cause honsetly the truth is that you know I'm never leaving, 'cause your my angel sent from above. (bove bove) Me and you can do no wrong. My money is yours give you a lil more 'cause I love ya, love ya. With me girl is where you belong...-Love Me

Author: José Martí,  Nuestra America y Otros Escritos
Quote: We light the oven so that everyone may bake bread in it.

Author: Elisabeth Elliot
Quote: One does not surrender a life in an instant. That which is lifelong can only be surrendered in a lifetime.

Author: Ray Bradbury,  Fahrenheit 451
Quote: He glanced back at the wall. How like a mirror, too, her face. Impossible; for how many people did you know who reflected your own light to you? People were more often--he searched for a simile, found one in his work--torches, blazing away until they whiffed out. How rarely did other people's faces take of you and throw back to you your own expression, your own innermost trembling thought?

Author: Kelli O'Hara
Quote: It is such a luxury to open a new book that's highly recommended by friends - either an inspirational yet humorously self-deprecating memoir, or a page-turning piece of fiction.

Author: Steve Maraboli
Quote: Temptation is the feeling we get when encountered by an opportunity to do what we innately know we shouldn't.

Author: Philip Pullman,  The Amber Spyglass
Quote: because he's Will

Author: Euripides
Quote: When a good man is hurt, all who would be called good must suffer with him.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience
Quote: Think of the patience God has had for you and let it resonate to others. If you want a more patient world, let patience be your motto

Author: Terry Eagleton,  Why Marx Was Right
Quote: After all, if you do not resist the apparently inevitable, you will never know how inevitable the inevitable was.

Author: Sheri Dew,  If Life Were Easy, It Wouldn't Be Hard: And Other Reassuring Truths
Quote: We're not alone--at least, we're alone only if we choose to be alone. We're alone only if we choose to go through life relying solely on our own strength rather than learning to draw upon the power of God.

Author: Marshall McLuhan
Quote: Our Age of Anxiety is, in great part, the result of trying to do today’s jobs with yesterday’s tools!

Author: Banana Yoshimoto,  Kitchen
Quote: Again and again I will suffer; again and again I will get back on my feet. I will not be defeated. I won't let my spirit be destroyed.

Author: Sheri Dew,  If Life Were Easy, It Wouldn't Be Hard: And Other Reassuring Truths
Quote: If you're serious about sanctification, you can expect to experience heart-wrenching moments that try your faith, your endurance, and your patience.

Author: C.S. Lewis
Quote: We can never know what might have been but what is to come is another matter entirely

Author: Benito Mussolini
Quote: It is better to live one day as a lion than 100 years as a sheep.

Author: Augustine of Hippo,  Confessions
Quote: I held my heart back from positively accepting anything, since I was afraid of another fall, and in this condition of suspense I was being all the more killed.

Author: Norton Juster,  The Phantom Tollbooth
Quote: ... what you learn today, for no reason at all, will help you discover all the wonderful secrets of tomorrow.

Author: Lori Osterman
Quote: You are stronger than you know.

Author: Mother Teresa
Quote: In the final analysis it is between you and God, it was never between you and them anyway.

Author: Eckhart Tolle,  The Power of Now: A Guide to Spiritual Enlightenment
Quote: Reading is my passion and my escape since I was 5 years old. Overall, children don't realize the magic that can live inside their own heads. Better even then any movie.

Author: Joe Klein
Quote: Barack Obama's inspirational whoosh to the presidency in 2008 was unusual. Most campaigns are less exhilarating; indeed, they are downright disappointing - until someone wins.

Author: Bruce Lee
Quote: Don't get set into one form, adapt it and build your own, and let it grow, be like water.

Author: Hazrat Ali Ibn Abu-Talib A.S
Quote: Courtesy costs nothing, but buys everything.

Author: Epictetus
Quote: No man is free who is not master of himself.

Author: Albert Einstein
Quote: Great spirits have always encountered opposition from mediocre minds. The mediocre mind is incapable of understanding the man who refuses to bow blindly to conventional prejudices and chooses instead to express his opinions courageously and honestly.

Author: Swami Vivekananda
Quote: Strength is Life, Weakness is Death.Expansion is Life, Contraction is Death.Love is Life, Hatred is Death.

Author: Robert M. Drake
Quote: The best kind of humans are the ones who stay.

Author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
Quote: The reward of a thing well done is having done it.

Author: Edna St. Vincent Millay
Quote: Music, my rampart and my only one.

Author: Marilyn Monroe,  Marilyn: Her Life in Her Own Words
Quote: just because you fail once, it doesn't mean you're going to fail at everything. keep trying, hold on, and always, always, always believe in yourself because if you don't, then who will? so keep your head high, keep your chin up, and most importantly, keep smiling because life's a beautiful thing and there's so much to smile about.

Author: Alex Sanchez
Quote: The pressures on gay teens can be overwhelming--to keep secrets, tell lies, deny who you are, and try to be who you're not. Remember: you are special and worth being cared about, loved, and accepted just as you are. Never, ever let anyone convince you otherwise.

Author: Sarah Dessen,  Along for the Ride
Quote: Failing sucks. But it's better than the alternative.""Which is?""Not even trying."Now he did look at me, straight on. "Life's short, you know?

Author: C. JoyBell C.
Quote: My spirit is healthy, yes. But I tell you, my flesh is healthy too. I am enlightened and free, but I am also lustful and carnal.

Author: C. JoyBell C.,  Saint Paul Trois Chateaux: 1948
Quote: You can see the whole entire world in the eyes of a person who knows how to simply stand there and take all of it into him but then you can look into the eyes of someone else and the whole entire world goes away and all that's left is you.

Author: Cecelia Ahern,  Thanks for the Memories
Quote: at your weakest, you end up showing more strength; at your lowest, you are suddenly lifted higher than you’ve ever been. They all border one another, these opposites and show how quickly we can be altered.

Author: Pittacus Lore,  The Power of Six
Quote: You kick ass Sam. And don't forget it

Author: Colleen Houck
Quote: You must learn to take a step back and visualize the whole piece. If you focus only on the thread given to you, you lose sight of what it can become.

Author: علي بن أبي طالب
Quote: لو كان الفقر رجلاً لقتلته !

Author: William Arthur Ward
Quote: We can choose to throw stones, to stumble on them, to climb over them, or to build with them.

Author: Julie Anne Peters,  Far from Xanadu
Quote: Miracles don't happen. You make them happen. They're not wishes or dreams or candles on a cake. They're not impossible. Reality is real. It's totally and completely under my control.

Author: Amit Ray
Quote: Whether you know or not, you are the infinite potential of love, peace and joy

Author: Enrique Jardiel Poncela
Quote: When something can be read without effort, great effort has gone into its writing.

Author: Amit Ray,  Om Chanting and Meditation
Quote: Silence is the language of Om. We need silence to be able to reach our Self. Both internal and external silence is very important to feel the presence of that supreme Love.

Author: Orson Scott Card,  Xenocide
Quote: I think you don't grow up until you stop worrying about other people's purposes or lack of them and find the purposes you believe in for yourself.

Author: Jack R. Rose,  The Cedar Post
Quote: Peace of mind comes when we exercise our right to be honest, especially with ourselves.

Author: Tricia Cunningham,  The Reverse Diet: Lose 20, 50, 100 Pounds or More by Eating Dinner for Breakfast and Breakfast for Dinner
Quote: No one wakes up in the morning and says, 'I want to gain 150 pounds and I will start right now!

Author: Chris Benz
Quote: I always like a woman in power in politics. I think they're pretty inspirational in terms of looks to begin with. It's very calculated.

Author: Joseph Smith Jr.,  The Book of Mormon
Quote: For he that diligently seeketh shall find; and the mysteries of God shall be unfolded unto them, by the power of the Holy Ghost, as well in these times as in times of old as in times to come; wherefore, the course of the Lord is one eternal round"- 1 Nephi 10:19

Author: J.K. Rowling,  The Tales of Beedle the Bard
Quote: Hope springs forever.

Author: Hayley Williams
Quote: Now I'm told this is life, and pain's just a simple compromise.

Author: Charles de Gaulle
Quote: Nothing great will ever be achieved without great men, and men are great only if they are determined to be so.

Author: Sherrilyn Kenyon,  Infinity
Quote: Tragedy and adversary are the stones we sharpen our swords against so we can fight new battles.

Author: Rudyard Kipling
Quote: Buy a pup and your money will buyLove unflinching that cannot lie.

Author: Hazrat Ali Ibn Abu-Talib A.S
Quote: Patience ensures victory.

Author: William Wordsworth
Quote: With an eye made quiet by the power of harmony, and the deep power of joy, we see into the life of things.

Author: Sojourner Truth
Quote: I'm not going to die, I'm going home like a shooting star.

Author: Gordon B. Hinckley
Quote: Respect for self is the beginning of cultivating virtue in men and women.

Author: Hlovate,  Versus
Quote: Bukan mudah untuk berubah... dari tanpa arah ke sejadah, dari tepi jalanan ke sujud menghadap Tuhan.

Author: George Santayana,  Soliloquies in England & Later Soliloquies
Quote: My atheism, like that of Spinoza, is true piety towards the universe and denies only gods fashioned by men in their own image, to be servants of their human interests.

Author: Alex Rogers,  I'm Only Human After All
Quote: Too many people out there tell us what we can and cannot do but…they don’t know who we are, what’s put in us.

Author: Tim McGraw,  Tim McGraw -- Live Like You Were Dying: Piano/Vocal/Chords
Quote: People always ask me"Son what does it takeTo reach out and touch your dreams?"To them I always sayAre you hungry?Are you thirsty?Is it a fire that burns you up inside?How bad do you want it?How bad do you need it?Are you eating, sleeping, dreamingWith that one thing on your mind?How bad do you want it?How bad do you need it?Cause if you want it allYou've got to lay it all out on the line

Author: Terry Lander,  Life Through the Eyes of an Insider: 101 Poems to Help You Understand Life Better
Quote: I’m not aspiring to be someone else – If I’m me for the rest of my life then so be it

Author: Cecelia Ahern,  The Book of Tomorrow
Quote: Hope like that, as I thought before, doesn’t make you a weak person. It’s hopelessness that makes you weak. Hope makes you stronger, because it brings with it a sense of reason. Not a reason for how or why they were taken from you, but a reason for you to live. Because it’s a maybe. A ‘maybe someday things won’t always be this shit.’ And that ‘maybe’ immediately makes the shittiness better.

Author: David Viscott
Quote: The purpose of life is to discover your gift. The meaning of life is to give your gift away.

Author: Kresley Cole
Quote: The bottom line is, insults only hurt when they come from someone I respect.

Author: Ambrose Bierce
Quote: You don't have to be stupid to be a Christian, ... but it probably helps.

Author: Criss Jami,  Diotima, Battery, Electric Personality
Quote: If ever you feel like an animal among men, be a lion.

Author: SARK
Quote: Buy or borrow self-improvement books, but don't read them. Stack them around your bedroom and use them as places to rest bowls of cookies.Watch exercise shows on television, but don't do the exercises. Practice believing that the benefit lies in imagining yourself doing the exercises.Don't power walk. Saunter slowly in the sun, eating chocolate, and carry a blanket so you can take a nap.

Author: Gordon B. Hinckley
Quote: I challenge every one of you who can hear me to rise to the divinity within you. Do we really realize what it means to be a child of God, to have within us something of the divine nature?

Author: Richelle E. Goodrich,  Smile Anyway: Quotes, Verse, & Grumblings for Every Day of the Year
Quote: Courage to me is doing something daring, no matter how afraid, insecure, intimidated, alone, unworthy, incapable, ridiculed or whatever other paralyzing emotion you might feel. Courage is taking action.....no matter what. So you're afraid? Be afraid. Be scared silly to the point you're trembling and nauseous, but do it anyway!

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience
Quote: Stop blaming outside circumstances for your inside chaos.

Author: Susan Jeffers,  Feel the Fear and Do It Anyway
Quote: Feel the fear and do it anyway!

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free
Quote: Don’t be disheartened by the forces of evil. Nothing can happen that God hasn’t allowed. Even resistance is all part of grand orchestration. The devil always has you right were God wants you.

Author: John Edward Williams,  Stoner
Quote: You must remember what you are and what you have chosen to become, and the significance of what you are doing. There are wars and defeats and victories of the human race that are not military and that are not recorded in the annals of history. Remember that while you're trying to decide what to do.

Author: Clint Eastwood
Quote: Respect your efforts, respect yourself. Self-respect leads toself-discipline. When you have both firmly under your belt,that's real power.

Author: Jennifer Elisabeth,  Born Ready: Unleash Your Inner Dream Girl
Quote: For so many years, I couldn’t understand why every time I thought that someone finally loved me, like… for real, they would eventually turn to vapor. Every person whom I’ve ever loved is trapped inside of my chest. I’ve breathed all of them in so deeply that I’ve nearly choked and died on every soul that I’ve ever given myself to.

Author: C. JoyBell C.
Quote: University can teach you skill and give you opportunity, but it can't teach you sense, nor give you understanding. Sense and understanding are produced within one's soul.

Author: Jillian Michaels
Quote: It's not about perfect. It's about effort. And when you bring that effort every single day, that's where transformation happens. That's how change occurs.

Author: Nathan Fillion
Quote: Saw a little girl touch a big bug and shout, "I conquered my fear! YES!"and calmly walk away. I was inspired.

Author: Morrie Camhi
Quote: We see things not as they are, we see them as WE are.

Author: Bethany Hamilton,  Soul Surfer: A True Story of Faith, Family, and Fighting to Get Back on the Board
Quote: I don't really want people looking to me for inspiration. I just want to be a sign along the way that points toward Heaven.

Author: Lynn Austin,  Candle in the Darkness
Quote: Faith don't come in a bushel basket, Missy. It come one step at a time. Decide to trust Him for one little thing today, and before you know it, you find out He's so trustworthy you be putting your whole life in His hands.

Author: Amit Ray
Quote: Enjoy the limitless bliss consciousness here and now. The reality of you lies much beyond your sensory perceptions and boundaries.

Author: Isabel Lopez,  Isabel's Hand-Me-Down Dreams
Quote: If you can’t believe in miracles, then believe in yourself. When you want something bad enough, let that drive push you to make it happen. Sometimes you’ll run into brick walls that are put there to test you. Find a way around them and stay focused on your dream. Where there’s a will, there’s a way.

Author: Harriet Beecher Stowe,  Uncle Tom's Cabin
Quote: There are in this world blessed souls, whose sorrows all spring up into joys for others; whose earthly hopes, laid in the grave with many tears, are the seed from which spring healing flowers and balm for the desolate and the distressed.

Author: Sharon M. Draper
Quote: What's right isn't always popular, and whats popular isn't always right.

Author: Abraham Lincoln
Quote: Republicans are for both the man and the dollar, but in case of conflict the man before the dollar.

Author: A.A. Milne
Quote: On Wednesday, when the sky is blue,and I have nothing else to do,I sometimes wonder if it's true That who is what and what is who."- Winnie-the-Pooh

Author: Jodi Picoult,  Lone Wolf
Quote: Like a missing tooth, sometimes an absence is more noticeable than a presence.

Author: Gloria E. Anzaldúa
Quote: Caminante, no hay puentes, se hace puentes al andar. (Voyager, there are no bridges, one builds them as one walks.)

Author: Robert M. Drake
Quote: Sometimes the most beautiful people are beautifully broken.

Author: Andrew Davidson,  The Gargoyle
Quote: Didn't anyone ever tell you that the mouth is the front gate of all misfortune?

Author: Nancy D. Solomon
Quote: You get in life what you have the courage to ask for.

Author: Sharon Maas,  Of Marriageable Age
Quote: She might be without country, without nation, but inside her there was still a being that could exist and be free, that could simply say I am without adding a this, or a that, without saying I am Indian, Guyanese, English, or anything else in the world.

Author: Michael Crichton
Quote: Everyone has a hidden agenda. Except me!

Author: Maya Angelou
Quote: That's what you want to do? Then nothing beats a trial but a failure. Give it everything you've got. I've told you many times, 'Cant do is like Dont Care.' Neither of them have a home.

Author: Robert M. Drake
Quote: We swallowed the chaos because we knew we didn't want to be ordinary.

Author: E.A. Bucchianeri,  Brushstrokes of a Gadfly
Quote: Well, if it can be thought, it can be done, a problem can be overcome,

Author: Emma Stone
Quote: You're only human. You live once and life is wonderful so eat the damn red velvet cupcake!

Author: Tom Hiddleston
Quote: Every villian is a hero in his own mind.

Author: Madi Diaz
Quote: Coming to Nashville has been so motivating and inspirational. Just watching people live and breathe their music and create something that they can feel from start to finish.

Author: Colleen Hoover,  Slammed
Quote: Regret is counterproductive. It's looking back on a past that you can't change. Questioning things as they occur can prevent regret in the future.

Author: Shiv Khera,  You Can Win: A Step by Step Tool for Top Achievers
Quote: Under Adverse conditions - some people break down,some break records

Author: Patti Smith
Quote: Make your interactions with people transformational, not just transactional.

Author: David Baldacci,  The Simple Truth
Quote: Small mistakes tend to lead to large ones. Ours is a lifetime appoinment, and all you have is your reputation. Once it's gone, it doesn't comeback.

Author: Martin Luther King Jr.
Quote: We are faced with the fact, my friends, that tomorrow is today. Procrastination is still the thief of time. Over the bleached bones and jumbled residues of numerous civilizations are written the pathetic words ‘Too Late’.

Author: Maya Angelou
Quote: I want all my senses engaged. Let me absorb the world's variety and uniqueness.

Author: Robin Williams
Quote: See what I mean? You gotta be crazy. Ain't no time to be sane.

Author: Anne Frank,  The Diary of a Young Girl
Quote: I've learned one thing: you can only really get to know a person after a row. Only then can you judge their true character!

Author: Oscar Wilde,  The Picture of Dorian Gray
Quote: What fire does not destroy, it hardens

Author: Yasmin Mogahed
Quote: Never curse a fall. The ground is where humility lives.

Author: Natsuki Takaya
Quote: ...you must always be yourself, and do things at your own pace. Someday, you'll catch up.

Author: C. JoyBell C.
Quote: Cake is happiness! If you know the way of the cake, you know the way of happiness! If you have a cake in front of you, you should not look any further for joy!

Author: Santosh Kalwar
Quote: Life is an experiment in which you may fail or succeed. Explore more, expect least.

Author: C. JoyBell C.
Quote: The difference between me and other people is that they all walk around with onion skins wrapped around them. Pre-meditations, pretentions, the faces that they present to the world, the faces that they present to themselves.. onion skins that come in layer after layer. They're on the inside of all that. And I... I am the inside of the onion skin walking around. I am only me.

Author: Pearl S. Buck,  The Good Earth
Quote: Now, five years is nothing in a man's life except when he is very young and very old...- Wang Lung

Author: Elizabeth Berg,  The Year of Pleasures
Quote: Don't let your habits become handcuffs

Author: Robert M. Drake
Quote: But dear, don’t be afraid of love it’s only magic.

Author: Robert H. Schuller
Quote: Tough times never last. Tough people do

Author: Henry B. Eyring
Quote: God not only loves the obedient - He enlightens them.

Author: Sigmund Freud,  Civilization and Its Discontents
Quote: My love is something valuable to me which I ought not to throw away without reflection.

Author: Marilyn Vos Savant
Quote: Being defeated is often a temporary condition. Giving up is what makes it permanent.

Author: Ally Carter,  Don't Judge a Girl by Her Cover
Quote: And then, despite everything, I smiled and looked at the note and knew that spring would come —it always does. so I stared out that cold window, watching my breath collect on the glass, trying not to think about my life after the thaw.

Author: Katy Perry
Quote: Baby you're a firework, c'mon show 'em what you're worth..."~Firework

Author: Libba Bray
Quote: I change the world, the world changes me.

Author: Violet Haberdasher
Quote: Imagination is what you do with your inspiration.

Author: Nicholas Sparks,  A Walk to Remember
Quote: Halfway down the aisle, Jamie suddenly seemed to tire, and they stopped while she caught her breath...It was, I remembered thinking, the most difficult walk anyone ever had to make. In every way, a walk to remember.

Author: Eric Hoffer
Quote: We are told that talent creates its own opportunities. But it sometimes seems that intense desire creates not only its own opportunities but its own talents.

Author: Sandy Nathan
Quote: Do you have any advice for your readers?Lead the life that’s yours instead of faking someone else’s.

Author: Laila Ali
Quote: 'All in With Laila Ali' is educational, inspirational, compelling programming profiling individuals that have reached for the sky, pushed themselves to the limit and did things that you would think were impossible.

Author: Santosh Kalwar,  Quote Me Everyday
Quote: Every single desire can lead to dream and every single dream has possibility to become reality.

Author: Steve Maraboli
Quote: Allow yourself to enjoy each happy moment in your life.

Author: Voltaire
Quote: L'homme est libre au moment qu'il veut l'être.

Author: Lesley M.M. Blume,  Cornelia and the Audacious Escapades of the Somerset Sisters
Quote: Too many people realize at the end of their lives that they've taken for granted those who really love them.

Author: Paulo Coelho,  Aleph
Quote: Words are tears that have been written down. Tears are words that need to be shed. Without them, joy loses all its brilliance and sadness has no end.

Author: Jane Hamilton
Quote: It is books that are a key to the wide world; if you can't do anything else, read all that you can.

Author: Seth Godin
Quote: People don't believe what you tell them.They rarely believe what you show them.They often believe what their friends tell them.They always believe what they tell themselves.

Author: George E. Woodberry
Quote: Defeat is not the worst of failures. Not to have tried is the true failure.

Author: Charlotte Brontë,  Jane Eyre
Quote: To talk to each other is but a more animated and an audible thinking.

Author: Mitch Albom,  The First Phone Call from Heaven
Quote: Fear is how you lose your life...a little bit at a time...What we give to fear, we take away from...faith.

Author: J.C. Marino,  Dante's Journey
Quote: In every journey comes a moment... one like no other. And in that moment, you must decide between who you are... and who you want to be.

Author: Norman Vincent Peale
Quote: Believe it is possible to solve your problem. Tremendous things happen to the believer. So believe the answer will come. It will.

Author: Horace
Quote: Rule your mind or it will rule you.

Author: Madeleine L'Engle,  A Ring of Endless Light
Quote: I saw Eternity the other night,Like a great ring of pure and endless light,All calm, as it was bright,And round beneath it, Time, in hours, days, years,Driven by the spheres,Like a vast shadow moved, in which the worldAnd all her train were hurled.

Author: Michael A. Singer,  The Untethered Soul: The Journey Beyond Yourself
Quote: Only you can take inner freedom away from yourself, or give it to yourself. Nobody else can.

Author: John O'Donohue,  Anam Cara: A Book of Celtic Wisdom
Quote: Real intimacy is a sacred experience. It never exposes its secret trust and belonging to the voyeuristic eye of a neon culture. Real intimacy is of the soul, and the soul is reserved.

Author: Steven Spielberg
Quote: I don't dream at night, I dream at day, I dream all day; I'm dreaming for living.

Author: Wendy Mass,  Every Soul a Star
Quote: Whereever you end up;"Jack whispered into my ear."I wish you clear skies. Always

Author: Roger Crawford
Quote: You can t coast uphill.

Author: Sylvia Plath
Quote: Hurl yourself at goals above your head and bear the lacerations that come when you slip and make a fool of yourself. Try always, as long as you have breath in your body, to take the hard way–and work, work, work to build yourself into a rich, continually evolving entity.

Author: Sheri Dew,  If Life Were Easy, It Wouldn't Be Hard: And Other Reassuring Truths
Quote: Thus, when we plead for the gift of charity, we aren't asking for lovely feelings toward someone who bugs us or someone who has injured or wounded us. We are actually pleading for our very natures to be changed, for our character and disposition to become more and more like the Savior's, so that we literally feel as He would feel and thus do what He would do.

Author: Pidi Baiq
Quote: Masalah adalah apa yang kamu anggap masalah

Author: J.K. Rowling,  Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Quote: Don't count your owls before they are delivered.

Author: Robin S. Sharma
Quote: The mind is a wonderful servant, but a terrible master.

Author: C. JoyBell C.
Quote: I tell people not to be afraid of their fears; because their fears are not there to scare them, they're there to let them know that something is worth it. Yet I am often afraid. I guess that means in my life, lots of things have been worth it!

Author: Catherine Ryan Hyde
Quote: I've been known to write 10 pages a day for 10 days running before I take a breath. I am not a disciplined writer. I'm one of those people who laughingly call themselves inspirational writers, which basically means someone who has no control over their own creative process.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free
Quote: Happiness has to do with your mindset, not with outside circumstance.

Author: Virginia Woolf,  A Room of One's Own
Quote: Therefore I would ask you to write all kinds of books, hesitating at no subject however trivial or however vast. By hook or by crook, I hope that you will possess yourselves of money enough to travel and to idle, to contemplate the future or the past of the world, to dream over books and loiter at street corners and let the line of thought dip deep into the stream.

Author: Rodman Philbrick,  The Last Book in the Universe
Quote: Bean finds the best apple in our tree and hands it up to me. "You know what this tastes like when you first bite into it?"she asks. "No, what?""Blue sky.""You're zoomed.""You ever eat blue sky?""No,"I admit. "Try it sometime,"she says. "It's apple-flavored.

Author: Joseph Campbell,  The Power of Myth
Quote: Mythology is not a lie, mythology is poetry, it is metaphorical. It has been well said that mythology is the penultimate truth--penultimate because the ultimate cannot be put into words. It is beyond words. Beyond images, beyond that bounding rim of the Buddhist Wheel of Becoming. Mythology pitches the mind beyond that rim, to what can be known but not told.

Author: Beth Moore
Quote: True intimacy with God always brings humility.

Author: Sheri Dew
Quote: Noble and great. Courageous and determined. Faithful and fearless. That is who you are and who you have always been. And understanding it can change your life, because this knowledge carries a confidence that cannot be duplicated any other way.

Author: Eoin Colfer,  Airman
Quote: Other men look up and down, left and right; but men like us are different. We are visionaries.

Author: Oliver Wendell Holmes Sr.
Quote: The best of a book is not the thought which it contains, but the thought which it suggests; just as the charm of music dwells not in the tones but in the echoes of our hearts.

Author: Gore Vidal
Quote: The important thing is not the object of love, but the emotion itself.

Author: James E. Faust
Quote: Everybody in this life has their challenges and difficulties. That is part of our mortal test. The reason for some of these trials cannot be readily understood except on the basis of faith and hope because there is often a larger purpose which we do not always understand. Peace comes through hope.

Author: Francis of Assisi
Quote: Sanctify yourself and you will sanctify society.

Author: Sarah McLachlan
Quote: We're constantly being told what other people think we are, and that's why it is so important to know yourself.

Author: C. JoyBell C.
Quote: ‎"You shouldn't feel so bad about being afraid of so many things.""Why not?""Because if you weren't afraid never ever, then you couldn't be brave never ever.

Author: John Wooden,  Wooden: A Lifetime of Observations and Reflections On and Off the Court
Quote: Being a role model is the most powerful form of educating...too often fathers neglect it because they get so caught up in making a living they forget to make a life.

Author: David McCullough
Quote: History is a guide to navigation in perilous times. History is who we are and why we are the way we are.

Author: Thomas Paine
Quote: Let them call me a rebel and welcome. I feel no concern from it. But should I suffer the misery of devils, were I to make a whore of my soul.

Author: Megan Whalen Turner,  The Queen of Attolia
Quote: I inherited this country when I was only a child, Nahuseresh. I have held it. I have fought down rebellious barons. I've fought Sounis to keep the land on this side of the mountains. I have killed men and watched them hang. I've seen them tortured to keep this country safe and mine. How did you think I did this if I was a fool with cow eyes for any handsome man with gold in his purse?

Author: Sheryl Crow
Quote: Happiness is not having what you want, it is wanting what you have.

Author: Richard Bach,  Jonathan Livingston Seagull
Quote: We choose our next world through what we learn in this one. Learn nothing, and the next world is the same as this one, all the same limitations and lead weights to overcome.

Author: مريد البرغوثي,  ولدت هناك، ولدت هنا
Quote: عيب الإنسان الأكبر هو إنكاره عيوبه, ودفاعه المستميت عنها.

Author: Beth Revis
Quote: I wrote a book. It sucked. I wrote nine more books. They sucked, too. Meanwhile, I read every single thing I could find on publishing and writing, went to conferences, joined professional organizations, hooked up with fellow writers in critique groups, and didn’t give up. Then I wrote one more book.

Author: Zig Ziglar
Quote: Don't be distracted by criticism. Remember ~ the only taste of success some people have is when they take a bite out of you.

Author: Joseph Campbell,  The Hero's Journey: Joseph Campbell on His Life & Work
Quote: Just as anyone who listens to the muse will hear, you can write out of your own intention or out of inspiration. There is such a thing. It comes up and talks. And those who have heard deeply the rhythms and hymns of the gods, can recite those hymns in such a way that the gods will be attracted.

Author: Allan Lokos,  Pocket Peace: Effective Practices for Enlightened Living
Quote: Suffering usually relates to wanting things to be different from the way they are.

Author: Heather Vogel Frederick,  Pies & Prejudice
Quote: Never say 'I can't.' 'I can't' is a limit, and life is about breaking through limits. Say 'I will' instead.

Author: Michelle Obama
Quote: One of the lessons that I grew up with was to always stay true to yourself and never let what somebody else says distract you from your goals. And so when I hear about negative and false attacks, I really don't invest any energy in them, because I know who I am.

Author: Rumi,  The Essential Rumi
Quote: You're water. We're the millstone.You're wind. We're dust blown up into shapes.You're spirit. We're the opening and closing of our hands. You're the clarity.We're the language that tries to say it.You're joy. We're all the different kinds of laughing.

Author: Amit Ray,  Yoga and Vipassana: An Integrated Life Style
Quote: Searching outside of you is Samsara (the world). Searching within you leads to Nirvana.

Author: Santosh Kalwar
Quote: Earth is sad, Moon is shy, Sun is happy but wait a moment, I just forgot to tell you that I am the child of open sky.

Author: Tom Robbins,  Wild Ducks Flying Backward
Quote: Our great human adventure is the evolution of consciousness. We are in this life to enlarge the soul, liberate the spirit, and light up the brain.

Author: Joel Osteen
Quote: Faith activates God - Fear activates the Enemy.

Author: Patrick Ness,  The Rest of Us Just Live Here
Quote: Because sometimes there are problems bigger than this week’s end of the world and sometimes you just have to find the extraordinary in your ordinary life.

Author: Neal A. Maxwell
Quote: To be cheerful when others are in despair, to keep the faith when others falter, to be true even when we feel forsaken—all of these are deeply desired outcomes during the deliberate, divine tutorials which God gives to us—because He loves us. These learning experiences must not be misread as divine indifference. Instead, such tutorials are a part of the divine unfolding.

Author: Tom Hiddleston
Quote: I don't think anyone, until their soul leaves their body, is past the point of no return

Author: Laurence J. Peter
Quote: Speak when you are angry, and you'll make the best speech you'll ever regret.

Author: Walter Payton
Quote: When you're good at something, you'll tell everyone. When you're great at something, they'll tell you.

Author: Frank Warren,  PostSecret: Confessions on Life, Death, and God
Quote: Religious people fear hell -- Spiritual people have walked thru it.

Author: Catherine de Hueck Doherty
Quote: What you do matters — but not much. What you are matters tremendously.

Author: Mitch Albom,  The Five People You Meet in Heaven
Quote: Sacrfice,"the captain said. "You made one. I made one. We all made them. But you were angry over yours. You kept thinking about what you lost. You didn't get it. Sacrifice is a part of life. It's supposed to be. It's not something to regret. It's something to aspire to.

Author: Walter Isaacson,  Steve Jobs
Quote: Picasso had a saying - 'good artists copy, great artists steal' - and we have always been shameless about stealing great ideas.

Author: Toni Morrison
Quote: What I think the political correctness debate is really about is the power to be able to define. The definers want the power to name. And the defined are now taking that power away from them.

Author: Wesley Clark
Quote: When Bill Clinton ran in '92, and I listened to him, and I had of course known of his record from Arkansas, I found him extraordinarily inspirational, and I voted Democratic.

Author: David Levithan,  The Realm of Possibility
Quote: Once time is lit, it will burn whether or not you're breathing it in. Even after smoke becomes air, there is the memory of smoke. I am seeing as if by the light of a match, a glimpse of my life and having it feel right.

Author: Neil Gaiman,  The Graveyard Book
Quote: I think . . . I said things to Silas. He'll be angry.''If he didn't care about you, you couldn't upset him,' was all she said.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free
Quote: How would your life be different if…You stopped focusing on what you didn’t want and started focusing on what you do want? Let today be the day…You establish a clear intent, make a plan, and take actions towards your intent.

Author: Gayle Forman,  If I Stay
Quote: I do have a point to all this,” she continues. “There are like twenty people in that waiting room right now. Some of them are related to you. Some of them are not. But we’re all your family.” She stops now. Leans over me so that the wisps of her hair tickle my face. She kisses me on the forehead. “You still have a family,” she whispers.

Author: Eric Micha'el Leventhal
Quote: We are at our most powerful the moment we no longer need to be powerful.

Author: Walt Disney Company
Quote: Crowded classrooms and half-day sessions are a tragic waste of our greatest national resource - the minds of our children.

Author: Anaïs Nin
Quote: The personal life deeply lived always expands into truths beyond itself.

Author: Harvey Cocks
Quote: An actor must never be afraid to make a fool of himself.

Author: Rick Yancey,  The Infinite Sea
Quote: You never know when the truth will come home. You can’t choose the time. The time chooses you.

Author: Tommy Lasorda
Quote: The difference between the impossible and the possible lies in a person's determination.

Author: Marianne Williamson
Quote: The way of the miracle-worker is to see all human behavior as one two things: either love, or a call for love.

Author: Vincent van Gogh
Quote: I confess I do not know why, but looking at the stars always makes me dream.

Author: Francesca Lia Block,  Wasteland
Quote: I'll be inside the one who holds you. And then I won't be.

Author: Shannon L. Alder
Quote: The most intriguing people you will encounter in this life are the people who had insights about you, that you didn't know about yourself.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free
Quote: Simplify your life. You don't grow spiritual, you shrink spiritual.

Author: Amit Ray
Quote: Prayer is the sign of your weakness. Rely on your inner strength. You will be the winner.

Author: Patricia Briggs,  Dragon Blood
Quote: Survivors can't always choose their methods.

Author: Julia L. Roberts
Quote: I would rather have 30 minutes of "wonderful"than a lifetime of nothing special.

Author: John Bytheway
Quote: you cannot find happiness, outside the plan of happiness!

Author: Santosh Kalwar,  Quote Me Everyday
Quote: Nothing remains forever, only thing that remain forever is romantically stupid word forever.

Author: Evanescence
Quote: Nobody's perfect. I'm perfectly flawed.

Author: Hazrat Inayat Khan,  Mastery through Accomplishment
Quote: Very often in everyday life one sees that by losing one's temper with someone who has already lost his, one does not gain anything but only sets out upon the path of stupidity. He who has enough self-control to stand firm at the moment when the other person is in a temper, wins in the end. It is not he who has spoken a hundred words aloud who has won; it is he who has perhaps spoken only one word.

Author: Eva Ibbotson,  A Company of Swans
Quote: She was so intelligent that she could think herself into beauty. Intelligence...they don't talk about it much, the poets, but when a woman is intelligent and passionate and good...

Author: Sapardi Djoko Damono
Quote: Secangkir kopi yang dengan tenang menunggu kau minum itu tidak pernah mengusut kenapa kau bisa membedakan aromanya dari asap yang setiap hari kau hirup ketika berangkat dan pulang kerja di kota yang semakin tidak bisa mengerti kenapa mesti ada secangkir kopi yang tersedia di atas meja setiap pagi

Author: Santosh Kalwar,  A Very First Book Of Poems: Heartbreak
Quote: Some people like me, some don't. I don't understand, Where the difference comes from. My heart like them all. For a simple childish reason. We all are created equal, we all are humans.

Author: Victoria Addino
Quote: Never run from the enemy, tackle them

Author: Ian McEwan,  Atonement
Quote: At that moment, the urge to be writing was stronger than any notion she had of what she might write.

Author: Sophie Kinsella
Quote: If my writing comes to a halt, I head to the shops: I find them very inspirational. And if I get into real trouble with my plot, I go out for a pizza with my husband.

Author: Swami Sivananda
Quote: Put your heart, mind, and soul into even your smallest acts. This is the secret of success.

Author: Leonard Nimoy
Quote: Live Long and Prosper

Author: Pablo
Quote: Stop searching the world for treasure, the real treasure is in yourself.

Author: Steve Goodier
Quote: We could all do with a bit more joy in our lives couldn't we? The wonderful thing is that when we start spreading joy, we begin to actually experience more joy in our lives too!

Author: Lisa Mangum,  The Golden Spiral
Quote: Somehow difficulties are easier to endure when you know your dream is waiting for you at the end.

Author: Deepak Chopra
Quote: The third component of the Law of Dharma is service to humanity--to serve your fellow human beings and to ask yourself the questions,"How can I help? How can I help all those that I come into contact with?"When you combine the ability to express your unique talent with service to humanity, then you make full use of the Law of Dharma.

Author: Tom Hiddleston
Quote: The dream is to keep surprising yourself, never mind the audience

Author: Vince Lombardi Jr.
Quote: Success is never final. Failure is never fatal. It s courage that counts.

Author: Julie B. Beck
Quote: You can wake up every day looking forward to new adventures with hope smiling brightly before you because you have a Savior. You are baptized in His Church.... You just need to stay in, pressing forward with a brightness of hope to your heavenly home.

Author: Walt Whitman,  Leaves of Grass
Quote: I am larger, better than I thought; I did not know I held so much goodness.All seems beautiful to me.Whoever denies me, it shall not trouble me; Whoever accepts me, he or she shall be blessed, and shall bless me.

Author: Lurlene McDaniel,  Someone Dies, Someone Lives
Quote: Pain and suffering are the soil of strength and courage.

Author: Mahatma Gandhi
Quote: If I have the belief that I can do it, I shall surely acquire the capacity to do it even if I may not have it at the beginning.

Author: C. JoyBell C.
Quote: Peace is not a result inside us from everything around us. Peace is not submissive nor passive. On the contrary, peace is an overwhelming force which comes from within us, disrespectful of everything around us, a firm coalition of spirit and soul standing against all the unrest that abounds.

Author: Wanda E. Brunstetter,  Wanda E. Brunstetter's Amish Friends Cookbook: Desserts
Quote: If you are too busy to pray, you are busier than God wants you to be.

Author: Amari Soul,  Reflections Of A Man
Quote: You just have to say to yourself, "I am not willing to accept anything less than what I deserve! I am smart! I am Beautiful! I am a good woman and I deserve to be happy!"It all starts with you.

Author: Scott Hayden
Quote: Teachers have three loves: love of learning, love of learners, and the love of bringing the first two loves together.

Author: Edgar Lee Masters,  Spoon River Anthology
Quote: To put meaning in one's life may end in madness,But life without meaning is the tortureOf restlessness and vague desire--It is a boat longing for the sea and yet afraid.

Author: Gloria Steinem
Quote: Rich People plan for three generationsPoor people plan for Saturday night

Author: Christopher Barzak,  One for Sorrow
Quote: Sometimes you've got to be able to listen to yourself and be okay with no one else understanding.

Author: C. JoyBell C.
Quote: I have a dream.” “Is your dream very big?” “No.” “Well is it very grand?” “Not either.” “Neither?” “Neither.” “What is it then?” “It is very shiny.

Author: Rita Mae Brown
Quote: Creativity comes from trust. Trust your instincts.

Author: Bill Cosby
Quote: A sail boat that sails backwards can never see the sun rise.

Author: Lisa Genova,  Still Alice
Quote: ... just because [butterflies'] lives were short didn't mean they were tragic... See, they have a beautiful life.

Author: Miranda Hart,  Is It Just Me?
Quote: Look in the mirror and say, 'There is none other like you and for that reason alone you are beautiful.

Author: Neil Peart
Quote: You can surrender without a prayer, but never really pray without surrender. You can fight without ever winning, but never ever win without a fight.

Author: Jillian Michaels
Quote: Why choose to fail when success is an option?

Author: Violet Weingarten
Quote: Is life too short to be taking this shit, or is life too short to be minding it?

Author: Dean Koontz,  One Door Away from Heaven
Quote: When we make our own misery we sometimes cling to it even when we want so bad to change, because misery is something we know. The misery is comfortable.

Author: Alexander McQueen
Quote: Rap music's been around for too long now to be inspirational. The words are, but the music isn't.

Author: Jim Hinckley,  Route 66 Backroads: Your Guide to Scenic Side Trips & Adventures from the Mother Road
Quote: It is better to fill your head with useless knowledge than no knowledge at all.

Author: Chris Heimerdinger,  Feathered Serpent, Part 1
Quote: If you don't feel as close to God today as you did yesterday, who moved?

Author: Paulo Coelho,  The Alchemist
Quote: People need not fear the unknown if they are capable of achieving what they need and want.

Author: Kerstin Gier,  Smaragdgrün
Quote: Hearts can't be broken because they're made of marzipan.

Author: Theodore Roosevelt
Quote: Only those are fit to live who do not fear to die; and none are fit to die who have shrunk from the joy of life and the duty of life. Both life and death are parts of the same Great Adventure.

Author: Anne Frank,  The Diary of a Young Girl
Quote: The best remedy for those who are afraid, lonely or unhappy is to go outside, somewhere where they can be quite alone with the heavens, nature and God.

Author: Richard Bach,  Illusions: The Adventures of a Reluctant Messiah
Quote: The world is your exercise book, the pages on which you do your sums. It is not reality, though you may express reality there if you wish. You are also free to write lies, or nonsense, or to tear the pages.

Author: William Blake
Quote: Exuberance is beauty.

Author: عمرو شريف,  رحلة عقل
Quote: عندما تتأمل الوجود من حولك، انظر إليه كأنك تراه لأول مرة. إن الاعتياد على الأشياء التي حولنا يمثل حجابا بيننا وبين حقيقتها، يسمونه «حجاب الاعتياد».

Author: Arthur Conan Doyle
Quote: There are heroisms all round us waiting to be done.

Author: India.Arie
Quote: Life is a journey, not a destination; there are no mistakes, just chances we've taken.

Author: Mary Anne Radmacher
Quote: Courage doesn't always roar. Sometimes courage is the quietvoice at the end of the day saying, "I will try again tomorrow.

Author: Elisabeth Elliot,  Discipline: The Glad Surrender
Quote: Work is a blessing. God has so arranged the world that work is necessary, and He gives us hands and strength to do it. The enjoyment of leisure would be nothing if we had only leisure. It is the joy of work well done that enables us to enjoy rest, just as it is the experiences of hunger and thirst that make food and drink such pleasures.

Author: Mahatma Gandhi
Quote: Champions are made from something they have deep inside of them-a desire, a dream, a vison.

Author: Rabindranath Tagore
Quote: when you came you cried and everybody smiled with joy; when you go smile and let the world cry for you.

Author: John Burroughs
Quote: Leap and the net will appear

Author: C. JoyBell C.
Quote: I find no importance in showing others that I am happy; it's not important to me that they know or think that I am happy but what is important to me is that I am happy. I am interested in being happy, not in making others think or know that I am.

Author: Clarissa Pinkola Estés,  Women Who Run With the Wolves: Myths and Stories of the Wild Woman Archetype
Quote: Failure is a greater teacher than success

Author: Kelly Link,  Pretty Monsters: Stories
Quote: You have to salvage what you can, even if you're the one who buried it in the first place.

Author: Graham Swift,  Tomorrow
Quote: How quick and rushing life can sometimes seem, when at the same time it's so slow and sweet and everlasting.

Author: Charlotte Eriksson
Quote: So many people will tell you ”no”, and you need to find something you believe in so hard that you just smile and tell them ”watch me”. Learn to take rejection as motivation to prove people wrong. Be unstoppable. Refuse to give up, no matter what. It’s the best skill you can ever learn.

Author: Jennifer Elisabeth,  Born Ready: Unleash Your Inner Dream Girl
Quote: I can do this… I can start over. I can save my own life and I’m never going to be alone as long as I have stars to wish on and people to still love.

Author: Maya Angelou
Quote: I am overwhelmed by the grace and persistence of my people.

Author: John Bytheway
Quote: The best way to prepare for death is to live life to its fullest.

Author: Hazrat Ali Ibn Abu-Talib A.S
Quote: Beware of speaking too much, for it increases mistakes and engenders boredom.

Author: J.R.R. Tolkien,  The Fellowship of the Ring
Quote: It is wisdom to recognize necessity when all other courses have been weighed, though as folly it may appear to those who cling to false hope.

Author: Audrey Hepburn
Quote: To plant a garden is to believe in tomorrow.

Author: Neal A. Maxwell
Quote: Each of us is an innkeeper who decides if there is room for Jesus!

Author: Simone de Beauvoir,  Memoirs of a Dutiful Daughter
Quote: Be loved, be admired, be necessary; be somebody.

Author: Elizabeth Marie Pope,  The Perilous Gard
Quote: I never thought of it like that. I always thought of you as a part of me, like my own eyes or my own hands. You don't go around thinking 'I love my eyes, I love my hands', do you? But think what it would be like to live without your eyes or your hands. To be mad, or to be blind. I can't talk about it. It's how I feel.

Author: Alison Croggon,  The Crow
Quote: It is not given to us to know what difference we can make, and perhaps we can make no difference at all. But that is no reason not to make the attempt,"said Saliman quietly. "The Light shines more brightly in the darkness.

Author: Søren Kierkegaard
Quote: Therefore do not deceive yourself! Of all deceivers fear most yourself!

Author: Anaïs Nin
Quote: For too many centuries women have been being muses to artists. I wanted to be the muse, I wanted to be the wife of the artist, but I was really trying to avoid the final issue — that I had to do the job myself.

Author: Rubén Darío
Quote: You are an Universe of Universes and your soul a source of songs.

Author: جان جاك روسو
Quote: الناس يصرون علي رؤيتي علي صوره تخالف تماما ما أنا عليه و إنهم لن يروا أبدا في مكاني سوي الشخص الذي صاغوه لأنفسهم وشكلوه وفق هواهم ليكرهوه كما يشاءون ، و إذن فإنني أكون مخطئا لو أنني تأثرت من الطريقه التي يرونني بها إذ لا يجب أن أعيرها أي اهتمام حقيقي لأنني لست أنا من يرونه علي هذه الصوره!

Author: Michael Faudet
Quote: A mind possessed by unmade books.

Author: Rodney A. Winters,  Go Into the House
Quote: The fact that you are still alive assures you that God has something for you to accomplish.

Author: R. Kelly
Quote: I am very conscious of who I am as an artist and as an inspirational person.

Author: Friedrich Nietzsche
Quote: Arrogance on the part of the meritorious is even more offensive to us than the arrogance of those without merit: for merit itself is offensive.

Author: Peter Kreeft,  Jesus-Shock
Quote: We sinned for no reason but an incomprehensible lack of love, and He saved us for no reason but an incomprehensible excess of love.

Author: Carlos Castaneda,  The Teachings of Don Juan: A Yaqui Way of Knowledge
Quote: All paths are the same: they lead nowhere. ... Does this path have a heart? If it does, the path is good; if it doesn't, it is of no use. Both paths lead nowhere; but one has a heart, the other doesn't. One makes for a joyful journey; as long as you follow it, you are one with it. The other will make you curse your life. One makes you strong; the other weakens you.

Author: Lois Lowry,  The Giver
Quote: He wept because he was afraid now that he could not save Gabriel. He no longer cared about himself

Author: Lisa Unger,  Beautiful Lies
Quote: The Universe doesn't like secrets. It conspires to reveal the truth, to lead you to it.

Author: Will Smith
Quote: There's no reason to have a plan B because it distracts from plan A.

Author: Bryant S. Hinckley
Quote: Forget yourself and go to work.

Author: Anatole France
Quote: To accomplish great things, we must not only act but also dream, not only plan, but also believe!

Author: Hazrat Ali Ibn Abu-Talib A.S
Quote: Dislike in yourself what you dislike in others.

Author: Oprah Winfrey
Quote: It doesn't matter who you are, where you come from. The ability to triumph begins with you - always.

Author: Santosh Kalwar,  Quote Me Everyday
Quote: Friends are like bras, attached near your heart for support. Foes are like panties, deported, every now and then, when they get dirty.

Author: Ally Carter,  Only the Good Spy Young
Quote: I know too well how dangerous hope can be, how it grows and sometimes dies, taking its host with it. It's more powerful than anything Dr.Fibs keeps in his labs, more precious than all the secrets inside Sublevel Two.

Author: Dan Brown,  Angels & Demons
Quote: Buddha had said:"Each of us is a God. Each of us knows all. We need only open our minds to hear our own wisdom.

Author: Socrates
Quote: I decided that it was not wisdom that enabled [poets] to write their poetry, but a kind of instinct or inspiration, such as you find in seers and prophets who deliver all their sublime messages without knowing in the least what they mean.

Author: Kami Garcia,  Beautiful Chaos
Quote: Because saving the people you love isn't stupid. It isn't even a choice

Author: Dwight D. Eisenhower
Quote: Never let yourself be persuaded that any one Great Man, any one leader, is necessary to the salvation of America. When America consists of one leader and 158 million followers, it will no longer be America.

Author: Evanescence
Quote: Forget the place you're trying to get to and see the beauty in right now...

Author: Besa Kosova
Quote: Money can't buy happiness, but it certainly is a stress reliever.

Author: Lauren Myracle,  Let It Snow
Quote: We are all flawed, my dear. Every one of us. And believe me, we've all made mistakes. You've just got to take a good hard look at yourself, change what needs to be changed, and move one, pet.

Author: Nizar Qabbani
Quote: Light is more important than the lantern,The poem more important than the notebook

Author: Sheryl Sandberg,  Lean In: Women, Work, and the Will to Lead
Quote: I hope you find true meaning, contentment, and passion in your life. I hope you navigate the difficult times and come out with greater strength and resolve. I hope you find whatever balance you seek with your eyes wide open. And I hope that you - yes, you - have the ambition to lean in to your career and run the world. Because the world needs you to change it.

Author: Neale Donald Walsch
Quote: The Highest Thought is always that thought which contains joy. The Clearest Words are those words which contain truth. The Grandest Feeling is that feeling which you call love.

Author: Hazrat Ali Ibn Abu-Talib A.S
Quote: A wise man always has something to say, whereas a fool always needs to say something.

Author: Paulo Coelho
Quote: Every search begins with beginner’s luck. And every search ends with the victor’s being severely tested.

Author: Robert M. Drake
Quote: It’s funny, for all it took was a broken heart and that alone was enough, enough for her to do everything she ever dreamed of.

Author: Ursula K. Le Guin
Quote: Gradually the healing took place, seeming as it always does that it wasn't taking place.

Author: Walter Mosley
Quote: The first thing you have to know about writing is that it is something you must do everyday. There are two reasons for this rule: Getting the work done and connecting with your unconscious mind.

Author: Anonymous,  Holy Bible: King James Version
Quote: Do not neglect to show hospitality to strangers, for by doing that some have entertained angels without knowing it.

Author: Margaret Atwood
Quote: So much for endings. Beginnings are always more fun. True connoisseurs, however, are known to favor the stretch in between, since it's the hardest to do anything with. That's about all that can be said for plots, which anyway are just one thing after another, a what and a what and a what.

Author: John Wooden
Quote: It's what you learn after you know it all that counts.

Author: Hiromu Arakawa
Quote: So that the new generation that will be born can enjoy happiness. To pay the cost we will have to shoulder corpses and cross a river of blood(Riza Hawkeye -- Fullmetal Alchemist)

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience
Quote: Your life begins to change the day you take responsibility for it.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free
Quote: When you stop existing and you start truly living, each moment of the day comes alive with the wonder and synchronicity.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free
Quote: Scholars, theologians, and even poets have yet to be able to truly describe and touch upon the beauty, romance, and magic of a relationship built on 100% authenticity

Author: Terry Tempest Williams,  Leap
Quote: Faith is not about finding meaning in the world, there may be no such thing -- faith is the belief in our capacity to create meaningful lives.

Author: Malcolm Gladwell,  Outliers: The Story of Success
Quote: Hard work is only a prison sentence when you lack motivation

Author: Mary Baker Eddy,  Poems by Mary Baker Eddy
Quote: When angels visit us, we do not hear the rustle of wings, nor feel the feathery touch of the breast of a dove; but we know their presence by the love they create in our hearts.

Author: Tina A. Morgan
Quote: Always try and be a better person than you were yesterday, cause we aren't guaranteed tomorrow.

Author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
Quote: We are wiser than we know.

Author: Josip Novakovich,  Fiction Writer's Workshop
Quote: You don't need to wait for inspiration to write. It's easier to be inspired while writing that while not writing...

Author: Rodney Atkins
Quote: Every song you're trying to find something that going to connect in different ways but for me the songs that I'm really drawn to are inspirational, songs that lift you and that everybody can relate to no matter where you're from.

Author: Peter Marshall
Quote: The world has enough women who know how to be smart. It needs women who are willing to be simple. The world has enough women who know how to be brilliant. It needs some who will be brave. The world has enough women who are popular. It needs more who are pure. We need women, and men, too, who would rather be morally right than socially correct.

Author: Mahatma Gandhi
Quote: True love is boundless like the ocean and, swelling within one, spreads itself out and, crossing all boundaries and frontiers, envelops the whole world.

Author: Thomas Merton
Quote: By reading the scriptures I am so renewed that all nature seems renewed around me and with me. The sky seems to be a pure, a cooler blue, the trees a deeper green. The whole world is charged with the glory of God and I feel fire and music under my feet.

Author: Anna Freud
Quote: I was always looking outside myself for strength and confidence, but it comes from within. It is there all the time.

Author: Joseph Campbell,  A Joseph Campbell Companion: Reflections on the Art of Living
Quote: You become mature when you become the authority of your own life.

Author: Chitra Banerjee Divakaruni,  The Palace of Illusions
Quote: I am buoyant and expansive and uncontainable--but I always was so, only I never knew it!

Author: Corey Taylor,  Seven Deadly Sins: Settling the Argument Between Born Bad and Damaged Good
Quote: Live your life, no matter what that life is.

Author: Robin McKinley,  Sunshine
Quote: What we can do, we must do: we must use what we are given, and we must use it the best we can, however much or little help we have for the task. What you have been given is a hard thing--a very hard thing... But my darling, what if there were no one who could do the difficult things?

Author: Gloria Gaither
Quote: We may run, walk, stumble. drive, or fly, but let us never lose sight of the reason for the journey, or miss a chance to see a rainbow on the way.

Author: فؤاد حداد,  الأعمال الكاملة ( على الطريق الرمضانى ) - الجزء الثاني
Quote: العدالة والشرف والصدق كلام له معنى وله مضمون وجميل وممكن وحقيقى، بدليل إن الإنسان إللى مايقدرش عليه بيدعيه ويمثله، ودليل إنه بيكلف بعض الناس حياتهم

Author: Sue Monk Kidd
Quote: People in general would rather die than forgive. It's that hard. If God said in plain language. "I'm giving you a choice, forgive or die,"a lot of people would go ahead and order their coffin.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free
Quote: Love and compassion are the mother and father of a smile. We need to create more smiles in our world today. Smiles, after all, pave the way to a happy world.

Author: Glenn Beck
Quote: All men are created equal. It is what you do from there that makes the difference. We are all free agents in life. We make our own decisions. We control our own destiny.

Author: Shannon L. Alder
Quote: The moon will guide you through the night with her brightness, but she will always dwell in the darkness, in order to be seen.

Author: Daniel Radcliffe
Quote: Go boldly and honestly through the world. Learn to love the fact that there is nobody else quite like you.

Author: Pablo
Quote: Regardless of Sunshine or Rain, Be Thankful for another GREAT day…and treat Life as the ULTIMATE Gift.... Because IT IS :)

Author: Ellen DeGeneres,  Seriously... I'm Kidding
Quote: Above all things physical, it is more important to be beautiful on the inside - to have a big hear and an open mind and a spectacular spleen.

Author: Anthony Robbins
Quote: In life, you need either inspiration or desperation.

Author: Mira Grant,  Blackout
Quote: Given a choice between life and death, choose life. Given a choice between right and wrong, choose what's right. And given a choice between a terrible truth and a beautiful lie, choose the truth every time.

Author: Julie Garwood,  The Prize
Quote: A woman can't do anything about her appearance. Either she's pretty or she isn't. But her character is quite another matter.

Author: Michelle Richmond,  The Year of Fog
Quote: ...You find a way, somehow to get through the most horrible things, things you think would kill you. You find a way and you move through the days, one by one, in shock, in despair, but you move. The days pass, one after the other, and you go along with them - occasionally stunned, and not entirely relieved, to find that you are still alive.

Author: Paulo Coelho
Quote: One day you will wake up & there won’t be any more time to do the things you’ve always wanted. Do it now.

Author: Christopher Pike,  Phantom
Quote: You will see that the things you desire most are the very things that bring you the greatest sorrow.

Author: Patricia Briggs,  Dragon Bones
Quote: Trying is always enough.

Author: Lisa Genova
Quote: Be creative, be useful, be practical, be generous and finish big

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I fall in love with you four times a year: winter, spring, summer, and fall. The leaves may change, but how I feel about you does not.

Author: Felix Y. Siauw,  Beyond The Inspiration
Quote: see beyond the eyes can see, believe beyond the inspiration!

Author: Martina Boone,  Compulsion
Quote: It doesn't matter how great your shoes are if you don't accomplish anything in them.

Author: Boris Vallejo
Quote: There have been many different artists that have been inspirational. I suppose the question is directed to what was the reason why I went into fantasy illustration.

Author: Paulo Coelho,  Maktub
Quote: We have been moving along at such a fast pace that we no longer know what we are doing. Now we have to wait until our soul catches up with us.

Author: Aldous Huxley,  The Genius And The Goddess
Quote: The trouble with fiction,"said John Rivers, "is that it makes too much sense. Reality never makes sense.

Author: Linus Pauling
Quote: I have something that I call my Golden Rule. It goes something like this: 'Do unto others twenty-five percent better than you expect them to do unto you.' … The twenty-five percent is for error.

Author: Sandy Nathan,  Numenon
Quote: I’ve always hated the “Who are you?"question. This is a philosophical inquiry. Answering that question is why we’re on earth. You can’t answer it in thirty seconds or in an elevator.

Author: Vincent van Gogh
Quote: One must work and dare if one really wants to live.

Author: Julie Andrews Edwards
Quote: Sometimes opportunities float right past your nose. Work hard, apply yourself, and be ready. When an opportunity comes you can grab it.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free
Quote: Empowerment is the ability to refine, improve, and enhance your life without co-dependency.

Author: Nicki Minaj
Quote: I believe that life is a prize, but to live doesn't mean you're alive.

Author: Richard Bach
Quote: The meaning I picked, the one that changed my life: Overcome fear, behold wonder.

Author: Anita Roddick
Quote: Cynicism is what passes for insight when courage is lacking.

Author: Rachel Naomi Remen,  My Grandfather's Blessings : Stories of Strength, Refuge, and Belonging
Quote: Most of us lead far more meaningful lives than we know. Often finding meaning is not about doing things differently; it is about seeing familiar things in new ways.

Author: C. JoyBell C.
Quote: The sun shall always rise upon a new day and there shall always be a rose garden within me. Yes, there is a part of me that is broken, but my broken soil gives way to my wild roses.

Author: Paulo Coelho,  The Alchemist
Quote: I'm an adventurer, looking for treasure

Author: Rumi
Quote: You soak up my soul and mingle me. Each drop of my blood cries out to the earth. We are partners, blended as one.

Author: Jan Karon,  Home to Holly Springs
Quote: I'd like you to know that I have forgiven him. Again and again. Once done, course, back comes the Enemy to persecute and persecute, and I must ante up to God and forgive yet again.

Author: D.J. MacHale
Quote: I've made mistakes. More than my share. Hopefully, I've learned from them, but can't guarentee anything. There's only one thing I can promise. I'm taking this to the end."-Bobby Pendragon

Author: Kim Harrison,  White Witch, Black Curse
Quote: Nothing is so hard that it can't be found by searching.

Author: Gary L. Francione
Quote: Veganism is not a "sacrifice."It is a joy.

Author: Pablo
Quote: We only live once. We all have an expiration date after that we will never come again. I am not saying that to make you sad. I am saying that so you can cherish each moment in your life and be grateful that you are here and you are Special

Author: Bob Ong,  Macarthur
Quote: Mga bata pa kayo. Pag pinaniwalaan namin kayong hindi kayo naglaro ng tubig kahit na basang-basa ang mga damit ninyo, kayo ang niloloko namin. Hindi kayo ang nakakapanloko.

Author: Aberjhani,  The River of Winged Dreams
Quote: The death of a dream can in fact serve as the vehicle that endows it with new form, with reinvigorated substance, a fresh flow of ideas, and splendidly revitalized color. In short, the power of a certain kind of dream is such that death need not indicate finality at all but rather signify a metaphysical and metaphorical leap forward.

Author: James Ross
Quote: Stay true to yourself and listen to your inner voice. It will lead you to your dream.

Author: Connie Willis,  The Winds of Marble Arch and Other Stories
Quote: Actually, writers have no business writing about their own works. They either wax conceited, saying things like: 'My brilliance is possibly most apparent in my dazzling short story, "The Cookiepants Hypotenuse."' Or else they get unbearably cutesy: 'My cat Ootsywootums has given me all my best ideas, hasn't oo, squeezums?

Author: Morgan Rhodes,  Falling Kingdoms
Quote: You must draw from that strength. You must increase it. And you must hold on to it because sometimes that small glimmer of inner strength is all that we have to help us press forward through the darkness.

Author: Wendy Wasserstein
Quote: Don't live down to expectations. Go out there and do something remarkable.

Author: Donzella Michele Malone
Quote: I have a self-made quote: Celebrate diversity, practice acceptance and may we all choose peaceful options to conflict.

Author: Kirsten Miller,  The Eternal Ones
Quote: My faith is big enough to accept all of God's wonders.

Author: Martin Amis
Quote: The universe is a million billion light-years wide, and every inch of it would kill you if you went there. This is the position of the universe with regards to human life.

Author: Hazrat Ali Ibn Abu-Talib A.S
Quote: It’s never the value of water but thirst, it’s never the value of life but death and it’s never about the friendship but trust.

Author: Criss Jami,  Killosophy
Quote: I think there is a song out there to describe just about any situation.

Author: Jane Clayson Johnson,  I Am a Mother
Quote: If you can control your behavior when everything around you is out of control, you can model for your children a valuable lesson in patience and understanding...and snatch an opportunity to shape character.

Author: Richard P. Denney
Quote: A book series is never truly over. The story lives on, even when the final page has been turned.

Author: Mary Anne Radmacher
Quote: it is (often) the quiet gesture which carries the most significance - the one which suddenly directs the symphony.

Author: Nancy Willard
Quote: Sometimes questions are more important than answers.

Author: Max Weinberg
Quote: I will always desire to play with Bruce Springsteen. He's the most inspirational, most dedicated, most committed and most focused artist I've ever seen. I like to be around people like that.

Author: Tom Robbins,  Still Life with Woodpecker
Quote: Often, moreover, it is...that aspect of our being that society finds eccentric, ridiculous, or disagreeable, that holds our sweet waters, our secret well of happiness, the key to our equanimity in malevolent climes.

Author: Rachel Gibson,  Tangled Up In You
Quote: just because you refuse to acknowledge something, refuse tolook at it or think about it, doesn’t mean it’s not there, that it doesn’taffect you and the choices you make in your life.

Author: Francine Rivers,  A Voice in the Wind
Quote: Unless we have something worth dying for, Atretes, we've nothing worth living for.

Author: Neal A. Maxwell
Quote: God's extraordinary work is most often done by ordinary people in the seeming obscurity of a home and family.

Author: Spencer Johnson,  Who Moved My Cheese?
Quote: He knew sometimes some fear can be good. When you are afraid things are going to get worse if you don't do something, it can prompt you into action. But it is not good when you are afraid that it keeps you from doing anything.
