Author: John O'Donohue
Quote: When one flower blooms spring awakens everywhere

Author: Paul Arden
Quote: Too many people spend too much time trying to perfect something before they actually do it. Instead of waiting for perfection, run with what you go, and fix it along the way…

Author: Glenn Beck
Quote: The moment you stop worrying about success is when success will happen.

Author: Hazrat Ali Ibn Abu-Talib A.S
Quote: Take Care Of Your Tongue Like The Way You Take Care Of Gold & Silver.

Author: Mary Anne Radmacher,  Lean Forward Into Your Life: Begin Each Day as If It Were on Purpose
Quote: Lean forward into your life...catch the best bits and the finest wind. Just tip your feathers in flight a wee bit and see how dramatically that small lean can change your life.

Author: Rachel Carson
Quote: The more clearly we can focus our attention on the wonders and realities of the universe about us the less taste we shall have for the destruction of our race. Wonder and humility are wholesome emotions, and they do not exist side by side with a lust for destruction.{Speech accepting the John Burroughs Medal}

Author: Angela N. Blount,  Once Upon a Road Trip
Quote: Everybody’s damaged. It’s just a question of how badly, and whether you’re healing or still bleeding.

Author: Larry Michael Dredla
Quote: Not feeling is no replacement for reality. Your problems today are still your problems tomorrow

Author: Denzel Washington,  A Hand to Guide Me
Quote: At the end of the day, it's not about what you have or even what you've accomplished. It's about what you've done with those accomplishments. Its about who you've lifted up, who you've made better. It about what you've given back"(23).

Author: Jim Stovall,  The Ultimate Gift
Quote: If we are not allowed to deal with small problems, we will be destroyed by slightly larger ones. When we come to understand this, we live our lives not avoiding problems, but welcoming them them as challenges that will strengthen us so that we can be victorious in the future.

Author: W. Clement Stone
Quote: Whatever the mind of man can conceive and believe, it can achieve

Author: Samuel Taylor Coleridge
Quote: He who is best prepared can best serve his moment of inspiration.

Author: Elizabeth Gilbert
Quote: Someone has to write all those stories: why not me?

Author: Hasrizal Abdul Jamil,  Secangkir Teh Pengubat Letih
Quote: Orang yang tidak pernah dibakar panas mentari, mustahil menghargai rimbun berteduh - peribahasa Turki.

Author: Jane Austen,  Pride and Prejudice
Quote: And to all this she must yet add something more substantial, in the improvement of her mind by extensive reading.

Author: Thea Kristine May
Quote: Appreciate every little beautiful moment in every day of your life. Give it a try and you'll see the world from another perspective.

Author: Aberjhani,  The River of Winged Dreams
Quote: Even when muddy your wings sparkle bright wonders that heal broken worlds.

Author: C. JoyBell C.
Quote: The coward says in his heart “There is no love.” Because, standing in the shadows of the big, grand, and powerful existence of love, his small spirit is left feeling even smaller and less significant. And so he chooses to deny the existence of love altogether. Because he is too small to have it.

Author: Will Fetters,  Memoirs
Quote: Our fingerprints don't fade from the lives we've touched.

Author: James Cameron
Quote: Curiosity is the most powerful thing you own.

Author: Chris Arnold
Quote: Think of yourself as a brand. You need to be remembered. What will they remember you for? What defines you? If you have it in you, do something that defines you. Invent something, develop a unique skill, get noticed for something — it creates a talking point.

Author: Roman Payne,  Crepuscule
Quote: 88. People wonder why so many writers come to live in Paris. I’ve been living ten years in Paris and the answer seems simple to me: because it’s the best place to pick ideas. Just like Italy, Spain.. or Iran are the best places to pick saffron. If you want to pick opium poppies you go to Burma or South-East Asia. And if you want to pick novel ideas, you go to Paris.

Author: Carter Burwell
Quote: The flow of Guiness into the studio was inspirational as well as nutritive.

Author: Lao Tzu
Quote: The journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step. Watch your step.

Author: Yann Martel,  Life of Pi
Quote: The paths to liberation are numerous, but the bank along the way is always the same, the Bank of Karma, where the liberation account of each of us is credited or debited depending on our actions.

Author: Bob Dylan
Quote: When You Cease To Exist, Then Who Will You Blame?

Author: Paulo Coelho,  Maktub
Quote: So long as you do no harm to another, change your opinion once in a while. Contradict yourself without being embarrassed. This is your right. It doesn't matter what others think -because that's what they will think, in any case.

Author: Luci Swindoll,  I Married Adventure
Quote: It's daring to be curious about the unknown, to dream big dreams, to live outside prescribed boxes, to take risks, and above all, daring to investigate the way we live until we discover the deepest treasured purpose of why we are here.

Author: Thucydides
Quote: We Greeks believe that a man who takes no part in public affairs is not merely lazy, but good for nothing

Author: Diana Princess of Wales
Quote: I went to the school and put it to William, particularly, that if you find someone you love in life, you must hang onto it, and look after it, and if you were lucky enough to find someone who loved you, then you must protect it.

Author: Roald Dahl
Quote: Bunkum and tummyrot! You'll never get anywhere if you go about what-iffing like that. Would Columbus have discovered America if he'd said 'What if I sink on the way over? What if I meet pirates? What if I never come back?' He wouldn't even have started.

Author: Paul Graham,  Hackers & Painters: Big Ideas from the Computer Age
Quote: There are few sources of energy so powerful as a procrastinating college student.

Author: Alexander McCall Smith,  The Double Comfort Safari Club
Quote: Be content with who you are and where you are, and do whatever you can do to bring to others such contentment, and joy, and understanding that you have managed to find yourself.

Author: Christopher Moore,  Coyote Blue
Quote: That's the scary thing about hope,"she said. "If you let it go too long it turns into faith.

Author: Sharon Kay Penman
Quote: ...A scar signifies past pain, a wound that did not heal as it ought. But it testifies, too, to survival...(Here be Dragons)

Author: Rodolfo Costa,  Advice My Parents Gave Me: and Other Lessons I Learned from My Mistakes
Quote: Take responsibility for your own happiness, do not expect people or things to bring you happiness, or you could be disappointed.

Author: E.A. Bucchianeri,  Brushstrokes of a Gadfly
Quote: Make your lives a masterpiece, you only get one canvas.

Author: Kahlil Gibran
Quote: I am the lover's gift; I am the wedding wreath;I am the memory of a moment of happiness;I am the last gift of the living to the dead;I am a part of joy and a part of sorrow.

Author: Abbie Hoffman
Quote: There is absolutely no greater high than challenging the power structure as a nobody, giving it your all, and winning!

Author: Sivananda Saraswati
Quote: There is something good in all seeming failures. You are not to see that now. Time will reveal it. Be patient.

Author: Al Munoz
Quote: If you're not happy in life then you need to change, calibrate, readjust...flush your negative energy and fill it with positive energy; How do we do that you might ask? well I would start by making others happy, deseases are not the only thing that spreads easy. We are all connected in some form of unseen energy... think how those around you will impact you and make you feel if they were happy?

Author: Michelle Paver
Quote: There's always a choice,' said Torak, and walked backward off the cliff.

Author: Shannon L. Alder
Quote: Beauty is not who you are on the outside, it is the wisdom and time you gave away to save another struggling soul, like you.

Author: Jane Goodall
Quote: A sense of calm came over me. More and more often I found myself thinking, "This is where I belong. This is what I came into this world to do.

Author: Jack Kerouac
Quote: It is possible for the human spirit to win after all.

Author: Frank Herbert
Quote: Guilt starts as a feeling of failure.

Author: Shane Koyczan
Quote: Someone once told me that the finer points of devotion are about the size of a pinhole, and there are millions of them. And if you could connect each dot, then you’ve got a diagram of what you think you thought you knew, and if you’re willing to admit that you know nothing…you have the blueprint for a breakthrough.

Author: Megan McCafferty,  Sloppy Firsts
Quote: There's only one racing strategy that matters.It's the one I run by: Get in the lead and don't let anyone pass you.

Author: Neil Gaiman
Quote: If you only write when inspired, you may be a fairly decent poet, but you'll never be a novelist.

Author: Mo Stegall
Quote: IF YOU CHOKE YOUR POTENTIAL BEFORE IT HAS AN OPPORTUNITY TO BECOME A POSSIBILITY YOU WILL NEVER REACH YOUR DESTINY

Author: Rachel Vincent,  My Soul to Take
Quote: ...don’t judge your future based on others’ mistakes.

Author: Jay Danzie
Quote: Your smile is your logo, your personality is your business card, how you leave others feeling after having an experience with you becomes your trademark.

Author: Neil Gaiman
Quote: There are people who think that things that happen in fiction do not really happen. These people are wrong.

Author: Shane Claiborne
Quote: Most good things have already been said far too many times and just need to be lived.

Author: Osric Chau
Quote: I do like alternative rock and rap, but as far as inspirational, then I go full-on orchestra. It fills up your entire being.

Author: Jennifer Crusie,  Welcome to Temptation
Quote: Nothing but good times ahead.

Author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry,  The Little Prince
Quote: Sometimes, there is no harm in putting off a piece of work until another day.

Author: Markus Zusak,  Getting the Girl
Quote: There are so many moments to remember and sometimes I think that maybe we're not really people at all. Maybe moments are what we are.... Sometimes I just survive. But sometimes I stand on the rooftop of my existence, arms stretched out, begging for more.

Author: Sarah Rees Brennan,  The Demon's Covenant
Quote: I don't trust men everybody likes. Being nice isn't the same as being good.

Author: Walter Scott
Quote: Is death the last sleep? No, it is the last and final awakening.

Author: Anne McCaffrey,  Acorna: The Unicorn Girl
Quote: A real scientist solves problems, not wails that they are unsolvable.

Author: Kyōichi Katayama
Quote: I wished the dream were real, and this reality a dream. But that wasn't the case. And that was why, whenever I woke up, I'd be crying. It wasn't because I was sad. When you return from a happy dream to sad reality, there's a chasm you have to step across, and you can't cross it without shedding tears. It doesn't matter how many times you do it.

Author: Staness Jonekos
Quote: No one invites you to the top - you have to claw your way up. When you get there, you will sit with the others who were also uninvited - giggling.

Author: Dan Millman,  Way of the Peaceful Warrior: A Book That Changes Lives
Quote: The warrior is Here, Now.

Author: Annette Hoggs-Jackson
Quote: In order to know who you are you need to know God is.

Author: Brad Szollose
Quote: If you really want the key to success, start by doing the opposite of what everyone else is doing.

Author: Paulo Coelho,  Warrior of the Light
Quote: A Warrior of Light values a child's eyes because they are able to look at the world without bitterness. When he wants to find out if the person beside him is worthy of his trust, he tries to see him as a child would

Author: Breaking Benjamin
Quote: Why give up?Why give in?

Author: Sharon Salzberg,  Real Happiness: The Power of Meditation
Quote: Mindfulness helps us get better at seeing the difference between what’s happening and the stories we tell ourselves about what’s happening, stories that get in the way of direct experience. Often such stories treat a fleeting state of mind as if it were our entire and permanent self.

Author: David Archuleta,  Chords of Strength: A Memoir of Soul, Song and the Power of Perseverance
Quote: Without inspiration, we’re all like a box of matches that will never be lit.

Author: Hamka,  Kedudukan Perempuan Dalam Islam
Quote: Jelas sekali bahwasanya rumah tangga yang aman damai ialah gabungan di antara tegapnya laki-laki dan halusnya perempuan

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience
Quote: If you want to find happiness, find gratitude.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience
Quote: Participate in your dreams today. There are unlimited opportunities available with this new day. Take action on those wonderful dreams you've had in your mind for so long. Remember, success is something you experience when you act accordingly.

Author: Samuel Johnson
Quote: It is necessary to hope... for hope itself is happiness.

Author: Jackson Browne
Quote: When you've found another soul who see's in to your own...take good care of each other..and remember to be kind..

Author: John Erskine
Quote: Music is the only language in which you cannot say a mean or sarcastic thing.

Author: Ursula K. Le Guin
Quote: To oppose something is to maintain it... You must go somewhere else; you must have another goal; then you walk a different road.

Author: C.T. Studd
Quote: Only one life, ’twill soon be past,Only what’s done for Christ will last.

Author: Henry Ward Beecher
Quote: Adversity, if for no other reason, is of benefit, since it is sure to bring a season of sober reflection. People see clearer at such times. Storms purify the atmosphere.

Author: Sarah Dessen,  Dreamland
Quote: But what he didn't understand was that this dreamland was preferable,walking through this life half-sleeping,everything at arm's length or farther away. I understood those mermaids.I didn't care if they sang to me.All I wanted was to block out all the human voices as they called me name again and again,pulling me upward into light,to drown.

Author: Aberjhani,  Songs from the Black Skylark zPed Music Player
Quote: Oh what a wonderful soul so bright inside you. Got power to heal the sun’s broken heart, power to restore the moon’s vision too.

Author: Mahatma Gandhi
Quote: The greatness of a nation and its moral progress can be judged by the way its animals are treated. I hold that the more helpless a creature the more entitled it is to protection by man from the cruelty of humankind.

Author: Pierce Brosnan
Quote: I thought 'Moulin Rouge' was inspirational, and 'Jesus Christ Superstar' I loved.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free
Quote: Today, many will choose to live free of conditions and rules governing their own happiness. Why not you? Do not let another day go by where your dedication to other people's opinions is greater than your dedication to your own emotions! Today's a new day!

Author: Sherwood Smith,  Crown Duel
Quote: Why is it the songs all end with the good people winning, but in life they don't?"They don't make songs when the good lose,"I muttered. "They make war chants against the bad. So there won't be any songs for us.

Author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
Quote: Trust men and they will be true to you; treat them greatly and they will show themselves great.

Author: John Knowles
Quote: It is a sad day when one looks back and sees that his largest regrets have become some of the most integral elements of his dreams.

Author: Amit Ray,  Nonviolence: The Transforming Power
Quote: Kindness has no religion. Religions are like narrow tracks but kindness is like an open sky.

Author: Susan B. Anthony
Quote: Cautious, careful people, always casting about to preserve their reputation and social standing, never can bring about a reform. Those who are really in earnest must be willing to be anything or nothing in the world's estimation, and publicly and privately, in season and out, avow their sympathy with despised and persecuted ideas and their advocates, and bear the consequences...

Author: Ezra Taft Benson
Quote: God loves us. He's watching us, he wants us to succeed, and we'll know someday that he has not left one thing undone for the eternal welfare of each of us. If we only knew it, there are heavenly hosts pulling for us -- friends in heaven that we can't rememer now, who yearn for our victory.

Author: Oprah Winfrey
Quote: Life is about becoming more of who you really are....

Author: Andrew Hussie
Quote: You understand reality while everyone else is running around confused and angry and upset because they think reality is something happening to them rather than something they are making every moment with every thought.

Author: Nora Roberts
Quote: And each book has to receive your best effort every single time. No slacking.

Author: Louise L. Hay
Quote: No matter where we live on the planet or how difficult our situation seems to be, we have the ability to overcome and transcend our circumstances.

Author: Mary Anne Radmacher
Quote: The jump is so frightening between where I am and where I want to be... because of all I may become I will close my eyes and leap!

Author: Anaïs Nin
Quote: One discovers that destiny can be diverted, that one does not have to remain in bondage to the first wax imprint made on childhood sensibilities. Once the deforming mirror has been smashed, there is a possibility of wholeness. There is a possibility of joy.

Author: René Descartes
Quote: To live without philosophizing is in truth the same as keeping the eyes closed without attempting to open them.

Author: Richard Bandler
Quote: If you can't enjoy what you have, you can't enjoy more of it.

Author: Thomas Merton,  No Man Is an Island
Quote: Music is pleasing not only because of the sound but because of the silence that is in it: without the alternation of sound and silence there would be no rhythm.

Author: Jason Mraz
Quote: Some of us go full circle. Some of us blindly go nowhere. The circle doesn’t have to be very large to make a point, kick your ass and/or be entertaining. Remember that and stay light. Even the deaf know good music when they hear it.

Author: C.S. Lewis
Quote: [The decay of Logic results from an] untroubled assumption that the particular is real and the universal is not.

Author: Max Planck,  Where is Science Going?
Quote: It is not the possession of truth, but the success which attends the seeking after it, that enriches the seeker and brings happiness to him.

Author: Demi Lovato
Quote: And if you think you're alone. Put on my music. Because I'm going to be there for you.

Author: 50 Cent
Quote: You shouldn't throw stones if you live in a glass house and if you got a glass jaw, you should watch yo mouth: cause I'll break yo face.

Author: Jodi Picoult
Quote: The thinnest slice would be teeming with memories of a love so strong it turned you inside out and left you gasping, and would be an identical match to a slice stored in the heart of a soul mate.

Author: Kurt Vonnegut
Quote: You are better than you think. A-one, a-two a-three.

Author: Amit Ray,  Yoga and Vipassana: An Integrated Life Style
Quote: Yoga is not just repetation of few postures - it is more about the exploration and discovery of the subtle energies of life.

Author: C. JoyBell C.
Quote: Man is not defiled by his impurities. It is the other man pointing out his impurities to him, whom he is defiled by. Is there anything anyone can do, to become righteous, anyway? God made us impure. If he had a problem with that, He would have made us gods, instead.

Author: Patti Smith,  Early Work, 1970-1979
Quote: In art and dream may you proceed with abandon. In life may you proceed with balance and stealth. For nothing is more precious than the life force and may the love of that force guide you as you go.

Author: Miyamoto Musashi
Quote: Perception is strong and sight weak. In strategy it is important to see distant things as if they were close and to take a distanced view of close things.

Author: William Shakespeare,  Macbeth
Quote: Methought I heard a voice cry, Sleep no more!Macbeth does murder sleep, - the innocent sleep;Sleep that knits up the ravell'd sleave of care, The death of each day's life, sore labour's bath,Balm of hurt minds, great nature's second course, Chief nourisher in life's feast.

Author: Henry Ward Beecher
Quote: Hold yourself to a higher standard than anyone else expects of you. Never excuse yourself.

Author: C.S. Lewis,  Till We Have Faces
Quote: I ended my first book with the words 'no answer.' I know now, Lord, why you utter no answer. You are yourself the answer. Before your face questions die away. What other answer would suffice? Only words, words; to be led out to battle against other words.

Author: Ann Brashares,  My Name Is Memory
Quote: A loving soul was always more beautiful over the long haul, but actual prettiness was fleeting.

Author: C. JoyBell C.
Quote: ‎"What does it mean if you tried to get somewhere, and you didn't?""Like what?""Like if you were trying to get somewhere, but you couldn't find it? Does that mean something bad?""No. It doesn't mean something bad. It just means you have a second chance to do it. And two chances is always better than just one.

Author: Amy Leigh Mercree
Quote: Self love is the elixir of an immortal heart.

Author: Mitch Albom,  The Five People You Meet in Heaven
Quote: People often belittle the place where they were born but heaven can be found in the most unlikely places.

Author: Michael J. Fox
Quote: When prescribing one of the drugs I take, my doctor warned me of a common side effect: exaggerated, intensely vivid dreams. To be honest, I've never really noticed the difference. I've always dreamt big.

Author: Donna Quesada,  Buddha in the Classroom: Zen Wisdom to Inspire Teachers
Quote: The effects you will have on your students are infinite and currently unknown; you will possibly shape the way they proceed in their careers, the way they will vote, the way they will behave as partners and spouses, the way they will raise their kids.

Author: Libba Bray,  A Great and Terrible Beauty
Quote: Pippa's laugh is bitter, tinged with tears. 'Ha! Why do girls think being beautiful will solve every problem? Being beautiful just creates problems. It's a misery. I wish I were someone else.

Author: Daniel Boulud
Quote: I think Spain will always remain inspirational, and I think French cuisine will continue to be very French and yet very relevant with its time and keep evolving. But the last thing you want for it is to become too trendy and confusing. It has too much history.

Author: Steve Maraboli
Quote: The power to change your life lies in the simplest of steps.

Author: Andrew Matthews
Quote: People who do not love themselves can adore others, because adoration is making someone else big and ourselves small. They can desire others, because desire comes out of sense of inner incompleteness, which demands to be filled. But they can not love others, because love is an affirmation of the living growing being in all of us. If you don’t have it, you cant give it.

Author: Tom Stoppard
Quote: Age is a very high price to pay for maturity.

Author: Bob Goff
Quote: Every day God invites us on the same kind of adventure. It's not a trip where He sends us a rigid itinerary, He simply invites us. God asks what it is He's made us to love, what it is that captures our attention, what feeds that deep indescribable need of our souls to experience the richness of the world He made. And then, leaning over us, He whispers, "Let's go do that together.

Author: John Ruskin
Quote: Remember that the most beautiful things in the world are the most useless.

Author: Patrick Carman,  The Dark Hills Divide
Quote: If bringing down the wall would require you to fly, you must believe you can fly. Otherwise, when the decisive moment comes, you will surely discover you ahve no wings.

Author: Veronica Roth
Quote: Writing means not just staring ugliness in the face, but finding a way to embrace  it.

Author: James McBride,  The Color of Water: A Black Man's Tribute to His White Mother
Quote: I asked her if I was black or white. She replied "You are a human being. Educate yourself or you'll be a nobody!

Author: Quentin Crisp
Quote: I am unable to believe in a God susceptible to prayer. I simply haven't the nerve to imagine a being, a force, a cause which keeps the planets revolving in their orbits, and then suddenly stops in order to give me a bicycle with three speeds.

Author: Bill Watterson
Quote: From now on I’ll connect the dots my own way.

Author: William Stafford
Quote: ...What you fear will not go away; it will take you into yourself and bless you and keep you. That's the world, and we all live there.

Author: Betty Greene
Quote: Bending beats breaking.

Author: Ruby Dee
Quote: The kind of beauty I want most is the hard-to-get kind that comes from within - strength, courage, dignity.

Author: Michael J. Fox
Quote: What other people think of me is not my business.

Author: Omega Maverick,  Gothic Inferno
Quote: I would rather be damned by my honesty, than caged by my lies.

Author: C. JoyBell C.
Quote: Humanity does not suffer from the disease of wrong beliefs but humanity suffers from the contagious nature of the lack of belief. If you have no magic with you it is not because magic does not exist but it is because you do not believe in it. Even if the sun shines brightly upon your skin every day, if you do not believe in the sunlight, the sunlight for you does not exist.

Author: C. JoyBell C.
Quote: It's not the law of religion nor the principles of morality that define our highways and pathways to God; only by the Grace of God are we led and drawn, to God. It is His grace that conquers a multitude of flaws and in that grace, there is only favor. Favor is not achieved; favor is received.

Author: Iwan Setyawan,  9 Summers 10 Autumns
Quote: Impian harus menyala dengan apa pun yang kita miliki, meskipun yang kita miliki tidak sempurna, meskipun itu retak-retak

Author: C. JoyBell C.
Quote: Thus is the nature of love: that you must use it! A love unused is not love! If it is something that sits on the shelf that you don't know what to do with, it is not true to the nature of love! Use love!

Author: Charles Dickens,  Great Expectations
Quote: It is not possible to know how far the influence of any amiable, honest-hearted duty-doing man flies out into the world, but it is very possible to know how it has touched one's self in going by.

Author: Criss Jami,  Venus in Arms
Quote: With a hint of good judgment, to fear nothing, not failure or suffering or even death, indicates that you value life the most. You live to the extreme; you push limits; you spend your time building legacies. Those do not die.

Author: Daisaku Ikeda
Quote: How aware are we of our own inner life, our spirituality-something so intangible yet so priceless? How much effort do we make to perceive that which is not obvious, which can neither be seen nor heard? I believe the exploration and enrichment of the human spirit is what determines our very humanity. Such enrichment provides an inner compass that can lead civilizations to greatness.

Author: Salman Aditya,  High in School
Quote: Enjoy every ounce of your life, get high and be sincere to anybody that comes around you.

Author: Santosh Kalwar,  Quote Me Everyday
Quote: Student: I don't feel like living anymore. Teacher: If you don't feel like doing something then don't do. This means that in finding many ways how not to live your life, you have the possibility to discover how to live your life.

Author: Tiger Woods
Quote: The greatest thing about tomorrow is, I will be better than I am today. And that's how I look at my life. I will be a better golfer, I will be a better person, I will be a better father, I will be a better husband, I will be a better friend. That's the beauty of tomorrow.

Author: Amit Ray
Quote: You are the perfect creation of God. Don't allow you to be down. God is experiencing through you.

Author: Amit Ray,  Yoga and Vipassana: An Integrated Life Style
Quote: Concentration attracts luck factor.

Author: Grandma Moses
Quote: And life is what we make it.Always has been, always will be.

Author: Marina Keegan
Quote: I'm scared of losing this web we're in. This elusive, indefinable, opposite of loneliness.

Author: Paulo Coelho,  Maktub
Quote: Negative desires can cause no evil if you do not allow yourself to be seduced by them.

Author: Simone Weil
Quote: We have to endure the discordance between imagination and fact. It is better to say, “I am suffering,” than to say, “This landscape is ugly.

Author: Criss Jami,  Killosophy
Quote: Doubt is a question mark; faith is an exclamation point. The most compelling, believable, realistic stories have included them both.

Author: David O. McKay
Quote: Man is a spiritual being, a soul, and at some period of his life everyone is possessed with an irresistible desire to know his relationship to the Infinite. . . . There is something within him which urges him to rise above himself, to control his environment, to master the body and all things physical and live in a higher and more beautiful world.

Author: Gloria E. Anzaldúa
Quote: A woman who writes has power, and a woman with power is feared.

Author: Pablo
Quote: This is the new year the new you. You can pass through another year, coasting on cruise control. Or you can step out of your comfort zone, trying things you have never done before, & make 2012 as the year that you elevate from where you are & soar high. Make it happen!

Author: Thomas Browne
Quote: I am the happiest man alive. I have that in me that can convert poverty to riches, adversity to prosperity, and I am more invulnerable than Archilles; Fortune hath not one place to hit me.

Author: T.S. Eliot,  The Sacred Wood
Quote: Immature poets imitate; mature poets steal; bad poets deface what they take, and good poets make it into something better, or at least something different.

Author: Hunter S. Thompson
Quote: Call on God, but row away from the rocks.

Author: Asif Kapadia
Quote: Hopefully, when people see 'Senna', they will understand why this inspirational story needed to be told, why it had to be made as a movie for the big screen, and why it is a film for everyone.

Author: Jenny O'Connell,  Plan B
Quote: Sometimes change was good. Sometimes it was even exactly what you needed.

Author: Peter Deunov
Quote: Stop in somebody's shadow to rest and cool down, and you are lost. No one can make anyone else happy.

Author: Kahlil Gibran,  The Prophet
Quote: He who is more mindful of one, loses the love and the faith of both.

Author: Kofi Annan
Quote: To live is to choose. But to choose well, you must know who you are and what you stand for, where you want to go and why you want to get there.

Author: Ahmad Fuadi
Quote: Man thalabal 'ula sahiral layaliSiapa yang ingin mendapatkan kemuliaan maka bekerjalah sampai larut malam

Author: Stevie Wonder
Quote: Heaven help the roses if the bombs begin to fall

Author: Russell Hoban
Quote: After all, when you come right down to it, how many people speak the same language even when they speak the same language?

Author: Courtney Love
Quote: I don’t need any plastic in my body to validate me as a woman.

Author: Brandon Mull,  Rise of the Evening Star
Quote: I will not know that day has come because I will not stop trying.

Author: Charles Dickens,  Five Novels: Oliver Twist, A Christmas Carol, David Copperfield, A Tale of Two Cities, Great Expectations
Quote: Be natural my children. For the writer that is natural has fulfilled all the rules of art."(Last words, according to Dickens's obituary in The Times.)

Author: Michael Scott
Quote: Some stories wait their turn to be told, others just tap you on the shoulder and insist you tell them.

Author: C. JoyBell C.
Quote: I think that if you have a horse, pegasus, qilin, or unicorn, you should sit on it! You should stroke its hair, whisper in its ear, be one with it! And you shouldn't feel sorry if other people don't have one.

Author: C. JoyBell C.
Quote: It’s the hard things that break; soft things don’t break. It was an epiphany I had today and I just wonder why it took me so very, very long to see it! You can waste so many years of your life trying to become something hard in order not to break; but it’s the soft things that can’t break! The hard things are the ones that shatter into a million pieces!

Author: Jean-Luc Godard,  Breathless
Quote: To be immortal and then die

Author: Sachin Tendulkar
Quote: People throw stones at you and you convert them into milestones.

Author: Tere Liye,  Rembulan Tenggelam Di Wajahmu
Quote: Tidak ada niat baik yang boleh dicapai dengan cara buruk, dan sebaliknya tidak ada niat buruk yang berubah baik meski dilakukan dengan cara-cara baik.

Author: James Redfield,  The Tenth Insight: Holding the Vision
Quote: We can become inspired to shape a higher, more ideal future, and when we do, miracles happen.

Author: Helen Hanson
Quote: Inspiration is the windfall from hard work and focus. Muses are too unreliable to keep on the payroll.

Author: Elaine Maxwell
Quote: Whether I fail or succeed shall be no man's doing but my own.I am the force.

Author: J.R.R. Tolkien,  The Lord of the Rings
Quote: Pippin glanced in some wonder at the face now close beside his own, for the sound of that laugh had been gay and merry. Yet in the wizard's face he saw at first only lines of care and sorrow; though as he looked more intently he perceived that under all there was a great joy: a fountain of mirth enough to set a kingdom laughing, were it to gush forth.

Author: Gordon B. Hinckley
Quote: Of course we're Christian. The very name of the church declares that. The more people see us and come to know us, the more I believe they will come to realize that we are trying to exemplify in our lives and in our living the great ideals which (Jesus Christ) taught.

Author: Lilith Saintcrow,  Betrayals
Quote: First you find out what you have , Dad would say. Then you figure out how to make it work for what you need, 'cause you don't get what you want. You get just what you have and no more.

Author: William Shakespeare,  Julius Caesar
Quote: Bid me run, and I will strive with things impossible.

Author: Hope Bradford,  Beneficial Law of Attraction: The Manifestation Teachings
Quote: Everyone creates realities based on their own personal beliefs. These beliefs are so powerful that they can create [expansive or entrapping] realities over and over.~Kuan Yin

Author: Marianne Williamson
Quote: We can't look to the world to restore our worth; we're here to restore our worth to the world. The world outside us can reflect our glory, but it cannot create it. It cannot crown us. Only God can crown us, and he already has.

Author: Tiana Dalichov,  Purification
Quote: Fear is a natural emotion in life, but you cannot let it dictate your actions. When you act out of fear, you will only meet failure. But act out of determination to conquer that fear, and you will succeed at anything. Maybe not the first time, or the second or third, but eventually—as long as you keep trying—you can conquer your fears and succeed.

Author: Queen Latifah
Quote: I don’t want to be a supermodel; I want to be a role model.

Author: Paulo Coelho
Quote: You came so that you could learn about your dreams,"said the old woman. "And dreams are the language of God. When he speaks in our language, I can interpret what he has said. But if he speaks in the language of the soul, it is only you who can understand.

Author: Ellen DeGeneres
Quote: I hope I make people feel better. I hope I take people out of their situations a little bit and make them happier. That's really why I do what I do.

Author: C. JoyBell C.
Quote: A lot of pieces I have written have to do with courage. As a result, people think that I am naturally brave. But what people don't know, is that I grew up with phobias and many fears. I was scared of everything. So, I write of courage not because I have not known fear, but I write of courage because I have walked with fear but I have made the choice not to fear it.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Poetic inspiration is all around us, and it surrounds us like silent music that makes our hearts vibrate. Any time you give or receive love, you are a part of a living poem.

Author: Oprah Winfrey,  Oprah Winfrey Speaks: Insights from the World's Most Influential Voice
Quote: Opportunity may knock only once but temptation leans on the door bell

Author: Michelle Geaney
Quote: Life will just not wait for us to live it:We are in it, now, and Now is the time to Live

Author: C.N. Bovee
Quote: No man is happy without a delusion of some kind. Delusions are as necessary to our happiness as realities.

Author: José Saramago,  Blindness
Quote: blindness is a private matter between a person and the eyes with which he or she was born.

Author: Nina LaCour,  Hold Still
Quote: It isn't the happy ending Ingrid and I had dreamed up, but it's all a part of what I'm working through. The way life changes. The way people and things disappear. Then appear, unexpectedly, and hold you close.

Author: Nikki Carter
Quote: let your haters be your motivators

Author: Paulo Coelho,  The Fifth Mountain
Quote: Although I have the colors, only the Lord can mix them with such harmony.

Author: Ellen Stofan
Quote: You see countries like India really investing in their space program because they see it as inspirational and good for their economy.

Author: Samantha Sotto,  Before Ever After
Quote: Life is a barter of choice and consequences.

Author: Jess C. Scott,  Clear: A Guide to Treating Acne Naturally
Quote: Be patient. Your skin took a while to deteriorate. Give it some time to reflect a calmer inner state. As one of my friends states on his Facebook profile: "The true Losers in Life, are not those who Try and Fail, but those who Fail to Try.

Author: Chris Heimerdinger,  Feathered Serpent, Part 2
Quote: Knowing the precies answers is not as crucial as the certainty that the answers do, in fact, exist.

Author: Augustine of Hippo
Quote: Our hearts have been made for you, O God, and they shall never rest until they rest in you.

Author: Candace Bushnell,  The Carrie Diaries
Quote: The world is full of people who all want the same thing, and you have to do a little something extra to make them remember you.

Author: Leo Buscaglia
Quote: Each of our acts makes a statement as to our purpose.

Author: John Bingham
Quote: Crossing the starting line may be an act of courage, but crossing the finish line is an act of faith. Faith is what kepes us going when nothing else will. Faith is the emotion that will give you victory over your past, the demons in your soul, & all of those voices that tell you what you can & cannot do & can & cannot be.

Author: Santosh Kalwar
Quote: My dream, is to dream, a dream.

Author: Gary Chapman,  The Five Love Languages Singles Edition
Quote: Love doesn't erase the past, but it makes the future different.

Author: Leo Buscaglia
Quote: Relish love in your old age! Aged love is like aged wine; it becomes more satisfying, more refreshing, more valuable, more appreciated and more intoxicating!

Author: Pancho Villa
Quote: Don't let it end like this. Tell them I said something.

Author: L. Curt Erler
Quote: Today is today, only today... tomorrow...it will only be yesterday.

Author: Joe Hill,  Horns
Quote: I am; I was. I want to be.

Author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu,  The Prince and the Pauper
Quote: Be a King. Dare to be Different, dare to manifest your greatness.

Author: Allan Lokos,  Pocket Peace: Effective Practices for Enlightened Living
Quote: Do not speak about anyone who is not physically present.

Author: Tricia Cunningham,  The Reverse Diet: Lose 20, 50, 100 Pounds or More by Eating Dinner for Breakfast and Breakfast for Dinner
Quote: Inspiration is external and motivation is internal. It is up to me to provide the switch and you to flip it on!

Author: Joseph Campbell,  The Hero's Journey: Joseph Campbell on His Life & Work
Quote: Now I found it in writing sentences. You can write that sentence in a way that you would have written it last year. Or you can write it in the way of the exquisite nuance that is sriting in your mind now. But that takes a lot of ... waiting for the right word to come.

Author: Henry David Thoreau
Quote: Beware of all enterprises that require new clothes.

Author: Michaelangelo
Quote: The greatest risk to man is not that he aims too high and misses, but that he aims too low and hits.

Author: Amit Ray
Quote: No one is to blame because there is no one other than you. Nothing is to disrespect because there is nothing other than you.

Author: Rhonda Byrne,  The Power
Quote: Start telling the story of your amazing life, and the law of attraction must make sure you receive it!

Author: C.S. Lewis,  Perelandra
Quote: Be confident small immortals. You are not the only voice that all things utter, nor is there eternal silence in the places where you cannot come.

Author: Peter C. Newman,  Here Be Dragons: Telling Tales Of People, Passion and Power
Quote: Even if it's absurd to think you can change things, it's even more absurd to believe that it is foolish and unimportant to try.

Author: Bob Goff,  Love Does: Discover a Secretly Incredible Life in an Ordinary World
Quote: Living a life fully engaged and full of whimsy and the kind of things that love does is something most people plan to do, but along the way they just kind of forget. Their dreams become one of those "we'll go there next time"deferrals. The sad thing is, for many there is no "next time"because passing on the chance to cross over is an overall attitude toward life rather than a single decision.

Author: Paulo Coelho
Quote: You must understand that love never keeps a man from pursuing his Personal Legend. If he abandons that pursuit, it's because it wasn't a true love.. the love that speaks the language of the world.

Author: Heber J. Grant
Quote: That which we persist in doing becomes easier to do, not that the nature of the thing has changed, but our power to do so is increased.

Author: Joseph Smith Jr.
Quote: And thus we see that by small means the Lord can bring about great things"- 1 Nephi 16:29

Author: Amit Ray
Quote: Energy comes not from your muscle neither from your heart. It comes from your inner source.

Author: فؤاد حداد,  الأعمال الكاملة ( على الطريق الرمضانى ) - الجزء الثاني
Quote: أنا مش حانكش القشرة علشان الجرح مايخلنيش أصوت، لكن حاكحت البوية علشان أشوف إللى تحتها

Author: Seth Godin,  Poke the Box
Quote: Soon is not as good as now.

Author: Ann Druyan
Quote: And what greater might do we possess as human beings than our capacity to question and to learn?

Author: Mother Teresa
Quote: There is a terrible hunger for love. We all experience that in our lives - the pain, the loneliness. We must have the courage to recognize it. The poor you may have right in your own family. Find them. Love them.

Author: James Allen,  As a Man Thinketh
Quote: Good thoughts and actions can never produce bad results; bad thoughtsand actions can never produce good results … We understand this law inthe natural world, and work with it; but few understand it in the mentaland moral world—although its operation there is just as simple and undeviating—and they, therefore, do not cooperate with it.

Author: Jennifer Elisabeth,  Born Ready: Unleash Your Inner Dream Girl
Quote: I look out into the water and up deep into the stars. I beg the sparkling lanterns of light to cure me of myself — my past and the kaleidoscope of mistakes, failures and wrong turns that have stacked unbearable regret upon my shoulders.

Author: Socrates
Quote: God takes away the minds of poets, and uses them as his ministers, as he also uses diviners and holy prophets, in order that we who hear them may know them to be speaking not of themselves who utter these priceless words in a state of unconsciousness, but that God himself is the speaker, and that through them he is conversing with us.

Author: C. JoyBell C.
Quote: Do you really believe in destiny?""How can I not believe in destiny, when there is no difference between my memories and my dreams at night? There's no difference between their reality. And if I dream something first, I remember it later when I am actually walking in the place or looking at the person I first dreamed of. Days later. Or years later. Destiny~ she walks with me.

Author: D.L. Moody
Quote: Every great movement of God can be traced to a kneeling figure.

Author: María Amparo Ruiz de Burton,  The Squatter and the Don
Quote: Let us cry for the spilt milk, by all means, if by doing so we learn how to avoid spilling any more. Let us cry for the spilt milk, and remember how, and where, and why, we spilt it. Much wisdom is learnt through tears, but none by forgetting our lessons.

Author: Washington Irving,  the legend of Sleepy Hollow and Other Stories
Quote: Others may write from the head, but he writes from the heart, and the heart will always understand him.

Author: Marie Joséphine de Suin
Quote: Boredom is the fear of self.

Author: Helen Sharman
Quote: The government will see that human spaceflight is useful - for science and the economy - and inspirational.

Author: Mary Ting,  Crossroads
Quote: CLAUDIA: I love you as high as the sky and as deep as the sea.MICHAEL: Multiply my love by infinity and take it to the depths of forever, and you still have only a glimpse of how much I feel for you. I love you more.

Author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
Quote: No law can be sacred to me but that of my nature. Good and bad are but names very readily transferable to that or this; the only right is what is after my constitution; the only wrong is what is against it.

Author: Dee Lestari,  Partikel
Quote: Menjadi kuat bukan berarti kamu tahu segalanya. Bukan berarti kamu tidak bisa hancur. Kekuatanmu ada pada kemampuanmu bangkit kembali setelah berkali-kali jatuh. Jangan pikirkan kamu akan sampai di mana dan kapan. Tidak ada yang tahu.Your strength is simply your will to go on.Supernova: Partikel

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free
Quote: Today is the only day in which we have any power.

Author: Ahmad Fuadi
Quote: Hidup sekali hiduplah yang berarti

Author: Winston S. Churchill,  The Second World War
Quote: I felt as if I were walking with destiny, and that all my past life had been but a preparation for this hour and for this trial... I thought I knew a good deal about it all, I was sure I should not fail.

Author: Anita Moorjani,  Dying to Be Me: My Journey from Cancer, to Near Death, to True Healing
Quote: I can't say this strongly enough, but our feelings about ourselves are actually the most important barometer for determining the condition of our lives!

Author: George Bernard Shaw
Quote: A miracle, my friend, is an event which creates faith.

Author: Oprah Winfrey
Quote: You teach people how to treat you.

Author: Hakan Günday,  Az
Quote: ‎"Belki de hayat yanlış anlayınca güzeldi. Sadece yanlış anlayınca. Ama her şeyi.

Author: K.J. Parker
Quote: The easiest way to do anything is properly.

Author: Lee Ezell
Quote: Pray to God, but row towards shore.

Author: Mark Twain
Quote: Nothing exists but you. And you are but a thought.

Author: Sukarno,  Di Bawah Bendera Revolusi : Jilid 1
Quote: Learning without thinking is useless, but thinking without learning is very dangerous!

Author: Paulo Coelho
Quote: What is a personal calling? It is God's blessing, it is the path that God chose for you here on Earth. Whenever we do something that fills us with enthusiasm, we are following our legend. However, we don't all have the courage to confront our own dream.

Author: C. JoyBell C.
Quote: One of the most beneficial and valuable gifts we can give to ourselves in this life: is allowing ourselves to be surprised! It is okay if life surprises you. Its a good thing!

Author: Mary O'Neill,  Hailstones and Halibut Bones
Quote: Think of what starlight And lamplight would lack Diamonds and fireflies If they couldn’t lean against Black. . . .

Author: Marilyn Suttle
Quote: Moods can be contagious. Don't catch or spread a bad mood.

Author: Bernard Kelvin Clive,  Your Dreams Will Not Die
Quote: They may try to stop you by their words and deeds, but like air you will rise above it all. You are unstoppable

Author: Kirsten Hubbard,  Wanderlove
Quote: I've come to realize that sometimes, what you love most is what you have to fight the hardest to keep.

Author: Pablo
Quote: Everything you need is already within you. The beauty of life is that your DESTINY lies always in your hands. The time has come for you to STEP UP and BE GREAT

Author: Michael Jackson
Quote: When you're strong and good, then you're Bad.

Author: Oswald Chambers
Quote: We are built for the valley, for the ordinary stuff we are in, and that is where we have to prove our mettle.

Author: Mizu Sahara
Quote: It's only natural to feel lonely after the enjoyable moments pass. But as you experience new joys those feelings of sorrow will start to fade.

Author: Audrey Hepburn
Quote: It's sad if people think that's (homemaking) a dull existance, [but] you can't just buy an apartment and furnish it and walk away. It's the flowers you choose, the music you play, the smile you have waiting. I want it to be gay and cheerful, a haven in this troubled world. I don't want my husband and children to come home and find a rattled woman. Our era is already rattled enough, isn't it?

Author: Miley Cyrus
Quote: If someone tells you you're not beautiful, turn around and walk away so they canhave a great view of your fabulous ass.

Author: Pete Hamill
Quote: I don't ask for the meaning of the song of a bird or the rising of the sun on a misty morning. There they are, and they are beautiful.

Author: Suzanne Woods Fisher,  A Lancaster County Christmas
Quote: When did wishing someone a Merry Christmas become politically incorrect?

Author: Aberjhani,  Elemental: The Power of Illuminated Love
Quote: Everywhere we shine death and life burn into something new…

Author: Keisha Keenleyside
Quote: fight for what you believe in,for if you don't you will be forever fighting against yourself.

Author: Octavian Paler,  Un om norocos
Quote: Există o limită a rezistenţei în fiecare. Când e atinsă, nu mai ai poftă să te justifici.

Author: Satchel Paige
Quote: Never let your head hang down. Never give up and sit down and grieve. Find another way. And don’t pray when it rains if you don’t pray when the sun shines.

Author: Amy Leigh Mercree
Quote: Celebrate who you are in your deepest heart. Love yourself and the world will love you.

Author: Sebastian Marincolo
Quote: Marijuana enhances our mind in a way that enables us to take a different perspective from 'high up', to see and evaluate our own lives and the lives of others in a privileged way. Maybe this euphoric and elevating feeling of the ability to step outsidethe box and to look at life’s patterns from this high perspective is the inspiration behind the slang term “high” itself.

Author: Chuck Close
Quote: Amateurs look for inspiration; the rest of us just get up and go to work.

Author: Betsy Byars,  The Moon and I
Quote: When I type a title page, I hold it and I look at it and I think, I just need four thousand sentences to go with this and I’ll have a book.

Author: Robert Battle
Quote: I grew up in a very spiritual home in a Liberty City neighborhood of Miami, FL. I was raised in the church, and my mother was a very inspirational person in my life.

Author: Stevie Nicks
Quote: When you grow up as a girl, the world tells you the things that you are supposed to be: emotional, loving, beautiful, wanted. And then when you are those things, the world tells you they are inferior: illogical, weak, vain, empty.

Author: J.A. Redmerski,  The Mayfair Moon
Quote: Time is cruel like life. It slows down so that you can truly experience the worst moments of it. Only if you make it through them do you get to say ‘It all happened so fast.

Author: Deepak Chopra,  The Third Jesus: The Christ We Cannot Ignore
Quote: If you contemplate the Golden Rule, it turns out to be an injunction to live by grace rather than by what you think other people deserve.

Author: Tom Kitt,  Next to Normal
Quote: Most people who think they're happy are really just stupid.

Author: David Levithan,  How They Met, and Other Stories
Quote: Music is everywhere. It’s in the air between us, waiting to be sung.

Author: Jim Rohn
Quote: The ultimate reason for setting goals is to entice you to become the person it takes to achieve them

Author: Danielle Hylton-Outland
Quote: ‎"Today's dirty hands are tomorrow's muddy water

Author: Roderick Evans
Quote: If you could only sense how important you are to the lives of those you meet; how important you can be to the people you may never dream of. There is something of yourself that you leave at every meeting with another person.

Author: Steve Maraboli
Quote: Life is a balanced system of learning and evolution. Whether pleasure or pain; every situation in your life serves a purpose. It is up to us to recognize what that purpose could be.

Author: Amit Ray
Quote: Do not accept whatever comes. Do not accept whatever goes. You have infinite power. Exercise your choice.

Author: Pramoedya Ananta Toer,  Child of All Nations
Quote: Kau Pribumi terpelajar! Kalau mereka itu, Pribumi itu, tidak terpelajar, kau harus bikin mereka jadi terpelajar. Kau harus, harus, harus, harus bicara pada mereka , dengan bahasa yang mereka tahu

Author: Polly Berrien Berends
Quote: Everything that happens to you is your teacher. The secret is to learn to sit at the feet of your own life and be taught by it. Polly B. Berends

Author: Adi Alsaid,  Let's Get Lost
Quote: It was time to let go of the mad desire to remember. It was time to start living whatever life would come. In the present, not the past.

Author: Catherine Doyle,  Vendetta
Quote: There is beauty everywhere; even in the dark, there is light, and that is the rarest kind of all.

Author: C. JoyBell C.
Quote: There is something simply beautiful and simply innocent, in being human. It is just so innocent and beautiful. I love it.

Author: Marina Tsvetaeva
Quote: Don't you know no one can escapethe power of creatures reaching outwith breath alone?

Author: Michael J. Fox
Quote: When life takes away, something of greater value is always given in return.

Author: Lama Surya Das
Quote: Forgiveness means letting go of the hope for a better past.

Author: Rob Brezsny
Quote: All of us need to be in touch with a mysterious, tantalizing source of inspiration that teases our sense of wonder and goads us on to life’s next adventure.

Author: John Muir
Quote: The power of imagination makes us infinite.

Author: Robin S. Sharma
Quote: A little bit of fragrance always clings to the hands that gives you roses

Author: Ken Petti
Quote: Jealousy is the lock that closes your heart, understanding is the key that opens it.

Author: Gordon B. Hinckley
Quote: Truly, my dear young friends, you are a chosen generation. I hope you will never forget it. I hope you will never take it for granted. I hope there will grow in your hearts an overpowering sense of gratitude to God, who has made it possible for you to come upon the earth in this marvelous season of the world's history.

Author: Confucius
Quote: Learn as if you were not reaching your goal and as though you were scared of missing it

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience
Quote: What we instill in our children will be the foundation upon which they build their future.

Author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry
Quote: Only the children know what they are looking for. They waste their time over a rag doll and it becomes very important to them; and if anybody takes it away from them, they cry...

Author: Ron Paul,  The Revolution: A Manifesto
Quote: Let the revolution begin.

Author: James Bryant Conant
Quote: Behold the turtle. He makes progress only when he sticks his neck out.

Author: Jennifer Elisabeth,  Born Ready: Unleash Your Inner Dream Girl
Quote: I’ve always seen this in you, ever since you were a little girl — this hunger to love other people into their highest selves and it’s what has made me irreversibly and just so forever in love with you.

Author: C. JoyBell C.
Quote: It is not needful for our dreams to be very grand nor very big. It is only needful for our dreams to be very shiny.

Author: Danielle Sibarium,  For Always
Quote: There’s nothing you can’t do if you want it bad enough.

Author: Jonathan Franzen,  The Corrections
Quote: Fiction is a solution, the best solution, to the problem of existential solitude.

Author: Tobsha Learner,  The Witch of Cologne
Quote: A man who denies his past is a man who truly denies himself a future, for he refuses to know himself, and to deny knowledge of oneself is to stumble through life as handicapped as the blind mute.

Author: Salim Akhukum Fillah
Quote: Segala luka & kecewa tampaknya kan malu & meniada: ketika kita insyafi bahwa Allah Yang Maha Mengatur tak pernah keliru, tak pernah aniaya

Author: Jim Henson,  It's Not Easy Being Green: And Other Things to Consider
Quote: I try hard not to judge anyone, and I try to bless everyone who is a part of my life, particularly anyone with whom I am having any problems

Author: Deepak Chopra
Quote: To only responsible choice I can make is to be love and happiness."Vincellent"Love the world as you love yourself".Lao Tze"The next step in mans evolution will be the survival of the wisest.

Author: Nina LaCour
Quote: I imagine what would happen if everyone turned their regrets into wishes, went around shouting them.

Author: Mario Puzo,  The Godfather
Quote: You can't hide the thunderbolt. When it hits you, everybody can see it. Christ, man, don't be ashamed of it, some men pray for the thunderbolt. You're a very lucky fellow. - Calo

Author: Amit Ray
Quote: Spirituality exist in testing and experiencing the depth of inner peace consistently.

Author: Susan Elizabeth Phillips
Quote: Here’s the life lesson I’ve learned, Fifi: Some people are born to play the hero, and some are born to play the bad guy. Fighting your destiny only makes life harder than it needs to be. Besides, people remember the villain long after they’ve forgotten the hero.

Author: Leo Tolstoy,  Anna Karenina
Quote: Ah, if everyone was as sensitive as you! There's no girl who hasn't gone through that. And it's all so unimportant!

Author: Neil Gaiman
Quote: Tell your story. Don't try and tell the stories that other people can tell. Any starting writer starts out with other people's voices. But as quickly as you can start telling the stories that only you can tell, because there will always be better writers than you and there will always be smarter writers than you, but you are the only you.

Author: Adrian Tan
Quote: You will find, that when you have someone to love, that the face is less important than the brain, and the body is less important than the heart.

Author: daily dose
Quote: One of the simplest ways to stay happy is letting go of the things that makes you sad.

Author: Nicholas Sparks,  The Longest Ride
Quote: In other words, our opinions and our thoughts and feelings, anything we experience, need not define us forever.

Author: Staness Jonekos
Quote: If you write it down, you can make it happen.

Author: Alexandra Robbins
Quote: It's not about what you've done; it's how you've experienced whatever has happened to you. Matt Lawrence in The Overachievers

Author: Dolly Parton
Quote: If you want the rainbow, you have to put up with the rain.

Author: Eric Micha'el Leventhal
Quote: Each person you meetis an aspect of yourself,clamoring for love.

Author: C. JoyBell C.
Quote: To buy a cake... to howl at the moon... to know true happiness... I am happy.

Author: Lucille Clifton
Quote: won't you celebrate with mewhat i have shaped intoa kind of life? i had no model.born in babylonboth nonwhite and womanwhat did i see to be except myself?i made it uphere on this bridge betweenstarshine and clay,my one hand holding tightmy other hand; come celebratewith me that everydaysomething has tried to kill meand has failed.

Author: C. JoyBell C.
Quote: If you follow the ancient maps written on the stars, no person will ever understand you. So if you could read these maps, would you follow them? And forever be misunderstood? Or would you close your eyes tightly and pretend to be like everyone else?

Author: Danielle Steel,  Five Days in Paris
Quote: Never lose hope, and if you can, find the courage to love again.

Author: Doug Dillon
Quote: The stars up there at night are closer than you think.

Author: Ray Bradbury,  Fahrenheit 451
Quote: Hello!"He said hello and then said, "What are you up to now?""I'm still crazy. The rain feels good. I love to walk in it. "I don't think I'd like that,"he said. "You might if you tried.""I never have."She licked her lips. "Rain even tastes good.""What do you do, go around trying everything once?"he asked. "Sometimes twice.

Author: Leo Buscaglia
Quote: The fact that I can plant a seed and it becomes a flower, share a bit of knowledge and it becomes another's, smile at someone and receive a smile in return, are to me continual spiritual exercises.

Author: Santosh Kalwar
Quote: Everything changes except the love.

Author: Mahatma Gandhi,  Hind Swaraj or Indian Home Rule
Quote: A man, whilst he is dreaming, believes in his dream; he is undeceived only when he is awakened from his slumber.

Author: Anne Lamott,  Traveling Mercies: Some Thoughts on Faith

Author: Anonymous,  Holy Bible: King James Version
Quote: Lord, be my rock of safety, the stronghold that saves me. For the honor of your name lead me and guide me.

Author: Maxwell Maltz
Quote: You make mistakes, mistakes don't make you

Author: Bruce Springsteen
Quote: It ain't no sin to be glad you're alive.

Author: Karl Rahner,  The Need and the Blessing of Prayer
Quote: When man is with God in awe and love, then he is praying.

Author: Laurell K. Hamilton,  Cerulean Sins
Quote: Sometimes you deal with the devil not because you want to, but because if you don't, someone else will.

Author: David Zindell,  The Wild
Quote: Who would bring light must endure burning.

Author: Christopher Isherwood,  A Single Man
Quote: If it’s going to be a world with no time for sentiment, it’s not a world that I want to live in.

Author: Roman Payne
Quote: I know a girl from whose body sunbeams rose to the clouds as if they’d fallen from the sun.Her laugh was like a bangle of bells. “Your hair is wet,” I told her one day, “Did you take a bath?” “It is dew!” she laughed, “I’ve been lying in the grass. All morning long, I lay here waiting for the dawn.

Author: Eben Alexander,  Proof of Heaven: A Neurosurgeon's Journey into the Afterlife
Quote: Communicating with God is the most extraordinary experience imaginable, yet at the same time it's the most natural one of all, because God is present in us at all times. Omniscient, omnipotent, personal-and loving us without conditions. We are connected as One through our divine link with God.

Author: Sharon Salzberg,  The Power of Meditation: A 28-Day Programme for Real Happiness
Quote: If you’re reading these words, perhaps it’s because something has kicked open the door for you, and you’re ready to embrace change. It isn’t enough to appreciate change from afar, or only in the abstract, or as something that can happen to other people but not to you. We need to create change for ourselves, in a workable way, as part of our everyday lives.

Author: Amit Ray
Quote: There is only one all pervading God. It has only one message - Love all, encompass all and transcend the limits of the selfish gene.

Author: Jennifer Elisabeth,  Born Ready: Unleash Your Inner Dream Girl
Quote: Stop trying to be less of who you are. Let this time in your life cut you open and drain all of the things that are holding you back.

Author: Demi Lovato
Quote: The Fact That You Have The Ability To Stand On Stage And Sing While You’re Crying Is So Brave.

Author: Amy Leigh Mercree
Quote: Kindness can transform someone's dark moment with a blaze of light. You'll never know how much your caring matters. Make a difference for another today.

Author: Pramoedya Ananta Toer,  Nyanyi Sunyi Seorang Bisu 1
Quote: Hidup tanpa harapan adalah hidup yang kosong

Author: Vera Nazarian,  The Perpetual Calendar of Inspiration
Quote: Have you ever seen the dawn? Not a dawn groggy with lack of sleep or hectic with mindless obligations and you about to rush off on an early adventure or business, but full of deep silence and absolute clarity of perception? A dawning which you truly observe, degree by degree. It is the most amazing moment of birth. And more than anything it can spur you to action. Have a burning day.

Author: Oprah Winfrey,  The Best of Oprah's What I Know For Sure
Quote: You did the best you could, the best you knew how at the time."It was something like that. From Oprah on an Oprah show. Then I believe my quote above was from Maya Angelou on the Oprah show, not Oprah herself. I had heard it before but it was on Oprah's show again 1-7-09 and she said Maya had said it.

Author: Angela Long
Quote: SilenceIt has a sound, a fullness.It's heavy with sigh of tree,and space between breaths.It's ripe with pause between birdsongand crash of surf. It's golden they say.But no one tells us it's addictive.

Author: M.D. Birmingham
Quote: The love of money is the root of all evil, therefore selfishness must be the seed.

Author: Daniel Defoe,  Robinson Crusoe
Quote: Thus we never see the true state of our condition till it is illustrated to us by its contraries, nor know how to value what we enjoy, but by the want of it.

Author: Hans F. Hasen
Quote: People inspire you, or they drain you. PICK THEM WISELY.

Author: Charles Dickens,  Great Expectations
Quote: Suffering has been stronger than all other teaching, and has taught me to understand what your heart used to be.

Author: Amy Tan,  The Joy Luck Club
Quote: I think now that fate is half shaped by expectation, half by inattention. But somehow, when you lose something you love, faith takes over. You have to pay attention to what you lost. You have to undo the expectation.

Author: Richard Bach
Quote: don't you think between here and now we will see each other once or twice?

Author: صلاح عبد الصبور
Quote: إن الله لا يعذبنا بالحياة، و لكنه يعطينا ما نستحقه، لأنه قد أسلمنا الكون بريئاً مادة عمياء نحن عقلها فماذا صنعنا به على مدى عشرات القرون، لقد لوثناه بالفقر و الاستعباد و الطغيان "ـ

Author: Simon Van Booy
Quote: I think music is what language once aspired to be. Music allows us to face God on our own terms because it reaches beyond life.

Author: Lucas Remmerswaal,  The A-Z of 13 Habits: Inspired by Warren Buffett
Quote: H is for Habit, winners make a habit of doing the things losers don't want to do.

Author: Abigail Adams,  My Dearest Friend: Letters of Abigail and John Adams
Quote: Its never to late to get back on your feet though we wont live forever make sure you accomplish what you were put here for

Author: Maurice Young
Quote: To become a master at any skill, it takes the total effort of your: heart, mind, and soul working together in tandem.

Author: H. Jackson Brown Jr.
Quote: Remember that the happiest people are not those getting more, but those giving more.

Author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu
Quote: A confident woman wears a smile and has this air of comfortability and pleasantness about her.

Author: Franz Werfel
Quote: Which road, which road did you takeThat brought you here at last?No road, no road did I take.I leaped, I leaped from dream to dream.

Author: Twyla Tharp,  The Creative Habit: Learn It and Use It for Life
Quote: Reading, conversation, environment, culture, heroes, mentors, nature – all are lottery tickets for creativity. Scratch away at them and you’ll find out how big a prize you’ve won.

Author: Malala Yousafzai
Quote: Let us make our future now, and let us make our dreams tomorrow's reality.

Author: Amit Ray,  Nonviolence: The Transforming Power
Quote: The light of compassion opens the petals of the heart. When the petals of the heart unfold fragrance spreads across the valley.

Author: Thomas Szasz
Quote: In the United States today, there is a pervasive tendency to treat children as adults, and adults as children. The options of children are thus steadily expanded, while those of adults are progressively constricted. The result is unruly children and childish adults.

Author: Dolly Parton
Quote: Cause I am strong and I can prove itAnd I got my dreams to see me throughIt's just a mountain, I can move itAnd with faith enough there's nothing I can't doAnd I can see the light of a clear blue morningAnd I can see the light of brand new dayI can see the light of a clear blue morningAnd everything's gonna be all rightIt's gonna be okay [lyrics from "Light of a Clear Blue Morning"]

Author: Irene Gonzalez Frei
Quote: There are things you do sometimes, actions that you take by obeying sudden impulses, without stopping for even a fraction of a second to think, and then you spend the rest of your life either lamenting it or thanking yourself for it. They are rare, unique, and perfect moments.

Author: Joyce Meyer,  Approval Addiction: Overcoming Your Need to Please Everyone
Quote: Being negative only makes a difficult journey more difficult. You may be given a cactus, but you don't have to sit on it.

Author: Jef Mallett
Quote: An opinion should be the result of thought, not a substitute for it.

Author: Jason Mraz
Quote: I think there’s no greater joy than completing a song out of thin air. It’s like inventing something, but it’s invisible, you know? It’s weird. It amazes me. You can send it out in the world, and that’s the joy. It’s like giving birth to all these songs and letting them go like they’re your kids.

Author: Criss Jami,  Killosophy
Quote: Soar with wit. Conquer with dignity. Handle with care.

Author: Marvin Gaye
Quote: Don't you know how sweet and wonderful life can be?

Author: Roman Payne
Quote: When I touched her body,I believed she was God.In the curves of her formI found the birth of Man,the creation of the world,and the origin of all life.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience
Quote: Dream your dream; and realize that you are more than just the dreamer, you are the point of origin for its reality.

Author: C. JoyBell C.
Quote: As the earth dies your spirit will bloom; as the world fades your soul will rise and glisten. Amongst the dehydrated crevices of a desert earth you will stumble upon your diamonds; in between the dry skulls and cracked bones you will find your sapphires.

Author: John Updike
Quote: Being able to write becomes a kind of shield, a way of hiding, a way of too instantly transforming pain into honey.

Author: H. Jackson Brown Jr.
Quote: Talent without discipline is like an octopus on roller skates. There's plenty of movement, but you never know if it's going to be forward, backwards, or sideways.

Author: John Milton
Quote: Is it true, O Christ in heaven, that the highest suffer the most?That the strongest wander furthest and most hopelessly are lost?That the mark of rank in nature is capacity for pain?That the anguish of the singer makes the sweetness of the strain?

Author: Linda Ellerbee
Quote: If you believe in your heart that you are right, then you must fight with all your might to do it your way. Only dead fish swim with the stream all the time.

Author: Democritus
Quote: Happiness resides not in possessions, and not in gold, happiness dwells in the soul.

Author: Karen Healey,  Guardian of the Dead
Quote: Stories change us; they change the world. People are stories of themselves.

Author: Amit Ray
Quote: Echo of your thoughts are more important than your actions because that has greater impact on the world.

Author: Charlotte Brontë,  Jane Eyre
Quote: Feeling without judgement is a washy draught indeed; but judgement untempered by feeling is too bitter and husky a morsel for human deglutition.

Author: Sivananda Saraswati
Quote: Let each man take the path according to his capacity, understanding and temperament. His true guru will meet him along that path.

Author: Andrew Murray
Quote: Answered prayer is the interchange of love between the Father and His child.

Author: Pablo
Quote: Stay away from conflictive, negative people that pull you down, because they contaminate your energy and impede your progress. Search for people who look at the world with optimism, that inspire you, make you happy and provide peace of mind.

Author: Jennifer Elisabeth
Quote: I love him in ways that I can’t explain to other people. They don’t understand… it’s not their fault.

Author: Randolph J. Rogers,  The Key of Life; A Metaphysical Investigation
Quote: I have found that the only consolation is never regretting anything that you do. Never look back, always look forward and continue moving along with a confidence that everything you’re doing and everything you’ve done is the way it’s supposed to be.

Author: Robert Muller
Quote: To forgive is the highest, most beautiful form of love. In return, you will receive untold peace and happiness

Author: Tao Lin,  Eeeee Eee Eeee
Quote: There was an enjoyment to being alive, he felt, that because of an underlying meaninglessness–like how a person alone for too long cannot feel comfortable when with others; cannot neglect that underlying the feeling of belongingness is the certainty, really, of loneliness, and nothingness, and so experiences life in that hurried, worthless way one experiences a mistake–he could no longer get at.

Author: John C. Maxwell
Quote: Stay focus on what God has assigned me to do. Keep my mind on what I am doing/

Author: H. Jackson Brown Jr.
Quote: Don’t waste time waiting for inspiration. Begin, and inspiration will find you.

Author: Stephen King,  On Writing: A Memoir of the Craft
Quote: I believe the first draft of a book — even a long one — should take no more than three months…Any longer and — for me, at least — the story begins to take on an odd foreign feel, like a dispatch from the Romanian Department of Public Affairs, or something broadcast on high-band shortwave duiring a period of severe sunspot activity.

Author: Santosh Kalwar
Quote: Every day is a journey filled with twists and turns. Every day, if you smile, you will feel alive, my son.

Author: Lauren Graham,  Someday, Someday, Maybe
Quote: Anyone can smile on their best day. I like to meet a man who can smile on his WORST.

Author: Vik Muniz
Quote: The really magical things are the ones that happen right in front of you. A lot of the time you keep looking for beauty, but it is already there. And if you look with a bit more intention, you see it.

Author: Toni Sorenson
Quote: Strength comes from struggle. When you learn to see your struggles as opportunities to become stronger, better, wiser, then your thinking shifts from "I can't do this"to "I must do this.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience
Quote: I want you to embark on the truth of loving yourself because when you love yourself and when you appreciate yourself, you will make healthy changes in your life for healthy reasons.

Author: Brother Andrew
Quote: We have to live a life that is more revolutionary than that of the revolutionaries.

Author: Amanda Rose
Quote: Sometimes it takes falling apart to ever have a chance of being fully whole.

Author: Kaiden Blake
Quote: YOU. ARE. PERFECT. You are. Im talking to YOU. and dont you dare think otherwise...embrace the entity of yourself...you are a puzzle piece and you are meant to be puzzling.

Author: Oscar Wilde
Quote: Pleasure is the only thing one should live for, nothing ages like happiness.

Author: Michael Soll
Quote: The problem with thick skin is that it leaves you impervious to the sharpest of pins. Everything becomes dull. But without that sense of pain, there cannot be that sense of relief. Ultimately, the thickened skin leaves you numb, incapable of feeling the highs and lows of life. It leaves you rough like a rock and just as inanimate.

Author: Robin Wijaya,  Before Us
Quote: Kadang kita harus memilih bukan karena kita menginginkan pilihan tersebut, tapi hanya karena pilihan tersebut, segalanya akan lebih baik.

Author: Jonathan Anthony Burkett,  Friends 2 Lovers: The Unthinkable
Quote: If two people are meant for one another, that doesn't mean that they have to rush and be together right away. Real love takes time to grow, just like how it takes time to grow from children to adults.

Author: Therese Benedict
Quote: When you walk a life of honesty, you live a life of truth.

Author: Victor Hugo,  Les Misérables
Quote: As for methods of prayer, all are good, as long as they are sincere.

Author: Vincent van Gogh,  Van Gogh's Starry Night Notebook
Quote: For my part I know nothing with any certainty, but the sight of the stars makes me want to dream.

Author: V.S. Naipaul,  A Bend in the River
Quote: Non-fiction can distort; facts can be realigned. But fiction never lies.

Author: Lauren Oliver,  Pandemonium
Quote: It's amazing how close I have been, all this time, to my old life. And yet the distance that divides me from it is vast.

Author: Dondi Scumaci
Quote: Play to win, not "not to lose".

Author: James Redfield,  The Tenth Insight: Holding the Vision
Quote: Inspiration is what keeps us well.

Author: Guy Finley
Quote: No one rises above who he or she has been without first having fallen down. The best time - in fact, the only time - to make a real change in your life is in the moment of seeing the need for it. He who hesitates always gets lost in the hundred reasons why tomorrow is a better day to get started.

Author: John Greenleaf Whittier
Quote: the joy that you give to others is the joy that comes back to you

Author: John Muir
Quote: How glorious a greeting the sun gives the mountains!

Author: C.R. Strahan
Quote: What if nobody showed up at Armageddon?

Author: Winston S. Churchill
Quote: Writing a long and substantial book is like having a friend and companion at your side, to whom you can always turn for comfort and amusement, and whose society becomes more attractive as a new and widening field of interest is lighted in the mind.

Author: Doreen Carvajal
Quote: You own everything that happend to you. Tell your stories. If people wanted you to write warmly about them, they should have behaved better.-- Anne Lamott

Author: Colin Powell
Quote: You don't know what you can get away with until you try.

Author: Gary L. Francione
Quote: If you are not vegan, please consider going vegan. It’s a matter of nonviolence. Being vegan is your statement that you reject violence to other sentient beings, to yourself, and to the environment, on which all sentient beings depend.

Author: Jennifer Elisabeth,  Born Ready: Unleash Your Inner Dream Girl
Quote: I feel a resurgence of my 6-year-old self… that little warrior, goddess of a girl reminding me of who I was when I was little, before the world got its hands on me.

Author: Jennifer Elisabeth
Quote: If ever I was running, it was towards you.

Author: Tere Liye,  Rembulan Tenggelam Di Wajahmu
Quote: Keberuntungan yang berlebihan selalu mengundang dengki.
